03oy1y5rwobZdg46.name: Sense Magic
03oy1y5rwobZdg46.description: The chuul senses magic within 120 feet of it at will. This trait otherwise works like the detect magic spell but isn't itself magical.

060hAjIEDdMDfVoE.name: Bite
060hAjIEDdMDfVoE.chat: The Adult Red Dragon attacks with its Bite.

06FRVwBFMJYhZ94o.name: Spider Climb
06FRVwBFMJYhZ94o.description: The pudding can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

07sdy4qaaW4MaB8W.name: Spellcasting
07sdy4qaaW4MaB8W.description:
The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks).

It has the following druid spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): [[/item .SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo]]{druidcraft}, [[/item .eCPQuQkIabFKTl9u]]{produce flame}, [[/item .VzgFzcmocr1X1cp4]]{shillelagh}

1st level (4 slots): [[/item .gMrWeG8fMDPRFiVe]]{entangle}, [[/item .B0pnIcc52O6G8hi8]]{longstrider}, [[/item .aL1F8fvYLtNzUbKu]]{speak with animals}, [[/item .WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]]{thunderwave}

2nd level (3 slots): [[/item .X8w9EzYLGc4vQ1H2]]{animal messenger}, [[/item .JPwIEfgUPVebr5AH]]{barkskin}
07sdy4qaaW4MaB8W.chat: The druid is a spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

0EcUwWcmWzFuiJyg.name: Stench
0EcUwWcmWzFuiJyg.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned] until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.
0EcUwWcmWzFuiJyg.chat: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a Constitution saving throw.

0NpX1YUDTXjgIm23.name: Bites
0NpX1YUDTXjgIm23.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 1d4 piercing average]] damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
0NpX1YUDTXjgIm23.chat: The Swarm of Bats attacks with a flurry of Bites.

0NvLts9eWaCvcOOn.name: Wakeful
0NvLts9eWaCvcOOn.description: When one of the ettin's heads is asleep, its other head is awake.

0Oap13hi3sDNwVZn.name: Spider Climb
0Oap13hi3sDNwVZn.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

0Ob35HZxhSF7p2ys.name: Bite
0Ob35HZxhSF7p2ys.chat: The Young Green Dragon attacks with its Bite.

0QJeW80m89X0RLNz.name: Swallow
0QJeW80m89X0RLNz.description:
The behir makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 ft. of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 ft. of movement, exiting prone.

0Y2ThqWytMPb9RlR.name: Magic Resistance
0Y2ThqWytMPb9RlR.description: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

0blKOND2AnsMsZa6.name: Etherealness
0blKOND2AnsMsZa6.description: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.
0blKOND2AnsMsZa6.chat: The hag magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. To do so, the hag must have a heartstone in her possession.

0fheJO7kmH1UV99g.name: Wing Attack
0fheJO7kmH1UV99g.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

0o0MDYjWjFsJFvQZ.name: Keen Sight
0o0MDYjWjFsJFvQZ.description: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

0otc04A190Q8hTBK.name: Splint Armor
0otc04A190Q8hTBK.description: This armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding. Flexible chain mail protects the joints.

0r0ClOXv3FyCYvTr.name: Blood Frenzy
0r0ClOXv3FyCYvTr.description: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

0xdLfPJEHYwh8MIT.name: Death Burst
0xdLfPJEHYwh8MIT.description: When the magmin dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 10 ft. of it must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried in that area are ignited.
0xdLfPJEHYwh8MIT.chat: When the magmin dies, it explodes in a burst of fire and magma. Each creature within 10 ft. of it must make a Dexterity saving throw. Flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried in that area are ignited.

0z51jBlE4BoPaEQn.name: Slam
0z51jBlE4BoPaEQn.chat: The Iron Golem attacks with its Slam.

13uVuBQP6VaiSPvC.name: Water Breathing
13uVuBQP6VaiSPvC.description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends. Affected creatures also retain their normal mode of respiration.
13uVuBQP6VaiSPvC.materials_component: A short reed or piece of straw

14epJr1iwk3pnPVs.name: Hold Breath
14epJr1iwk3pnPVs.description: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8.name: Dispel Magic
15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends. For each spell of 4th level or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, the spell ends.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you automatically end the effects of a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you used.

17bKqeydGVM0tR6p.name: Bite
17bKqeydGVM0tR6p.chat: The Ancient Bronze Dragon attacks with its Bite.

1ArcmRCn5G0t6sOo.name: Charge
1ArcmRCn5G0t6sOo.description:
If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
1ArcmRCn5G0t6sOo.chat: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes extra slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

1CXV3h3U6qnpZ7cU.name: Multiattack
1CXV3h3U6qnpZ7cU.description: The merrow makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .doFYltsiw2Fgp5gn]]{bite} and one with its [[/item .bbB0SMNW3l2SHEz5]]{claws} or [[/item .7XgQY1kwKPuoWX7t]]{harpoon}.

1EB34o4iqY7GN1HT.name: Echolocation
1EB34o4iqY7GN1HT.description: The whale can't use its blindsight while deafened.

1FbU02rRuNLnEDXC.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
1FbU02rRuNLnEDXC.description: While in sunlight, the specter has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

1GpwqMUVXUhKvZSS.name: Keen Smell
1GpwqMUVXUhKvZSS.description: The tiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

1IE8rHcJIihDWCda.name: Teleport
1IE8rHcJIihDWCda.description: The dog magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 40 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see. Before or after teleporting, the dog can make one bite attack.

1KAScMfU0fdHhR2g.name: Change Shape
1KAScMfU0fdHhR2g.description:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

1KyNbDtLLrcA5lj0.name: Trampling Charge
1KyNbDtLLrcA5lj0.description: If the horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the horse can make another attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.
1KyNbDtLLrcA5lj0.chat: If the horse moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a hooves attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on Strength saving throw.

1LTl2RCToU6ZLZdi.name: Web Sense
1LTl2RCToU6ZLZdi.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

1N53jrQmsZuhiREF.name: Snake Hair
1N53jrQmsZuhiREF.chat: The Medusa attacks with its Snake Hair.

1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B.name: Invisibility
1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B.description:
A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.
1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B.materials_component: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

1Ocl9VqVtWFu97Ua.name: Keen Sight
1Ocl9VqVtWFu97Ua.description: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

1YhP86rTuRIXKFi2.name: Scare
1YhP86rTuRIXKFi2.description:
One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 ft. of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the quasit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.
1YhP86rTuRIXKFi2.chat: One creature of the quasit's choice within 20 ft. of it must make a Wisdom saving throw. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the quasit is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success.

1aEgtsYuxz12hFn3.name: Multiattack
1aEgtsYuxz12hFn3.description: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with its [[/item .NSdAR332o65ZE3hC]]{bite} and one with its [[/item .VJlDAg21VwBOjbuR]]{claws} or [[/item .UqpaWsGVgiCMSZEw]]{spear}.

1fGoFeub69Dueemk.name: Siege Monster
1fGoFeub69Dueemk.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

1k9ihUu6sedelfkA.name: Amphibious
1k9ihUu6sedelfkA.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

1lGtRKKScQMq9K3R.name: Multiattack
1lGtRKKScQMq9K3R.description: The badger makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .NTUVjYVsAjweAj1R]]{bite} and one with its [[/item .BToZtvd0HCyQvoXC]]{claws}.

1mD9NcCf8ZMQtsrU.name: Frost Breath
1mD9NcCf8ZMQtsrU.description: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
1mD9NcCf8ZMQtsrU.chat: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of cold air. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

1oGgJQB1ItqyKoZ5.name: Whip
1oGgJQB1ItqyKoZ5.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.
1oGgJQB1ItqyKoZ5.chat: The Balor attacks with its Whip. The target must make a Strength saving throw.

1oNtSpRA4XS3L6to.name: Siege Monster
1oNtSpRA4XS3L6to.description: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

1rEzqo8fiLbeFE07.name: Turn Immunity
1rEzqo8fiLbeFE07.description: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

1uXv78I9YByiz6rV.name: Bite
1uXv78I9YByiz6rV.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned] for 1 minute. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is instead poisoned for 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) minutes and &Reference[unconscious] while poisoned in this way.
1uXv78I9YByiz6rV.chat: The Homunculus attacks with its Bite.The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

1yXz3JunJtlQs6vV.name: Bites
1yXz3JunJtlQs6vV.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 2d4 piercing average]] damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
1yXz3JunJtlQs6vV.chat: The Swarm of Insects attacks with a flurry of Bites.

22lf3TLPObmD4s6h.name: Bite
22lf3TLPObmD4s6h.chat: The Young Bronze Dragon attacks with its Bite.

250gOq5bpqIHb7rw.name: Greatclub
250gOq5bpqIHb7rw.chat: The Hill Giant attacks with its Greatclub.

27csbMlmaIFdMcTA.name: Lightning Absorption
27csbMlmaIFdMcTA.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

2AD5aTLMPDmQFhGZ.name: Slam
2AD5aTLMPDmQFhGZ.chat: The Earth Elemental attacks with its Slam.

2C0408CEBtrZW8ji.name: Invisibility (self only)
2C0408CEBtrZW8ji.description:
A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

2HPk5TdUTeEhD2eG.name: Bite
2HPk5TdUTeEhD2eG.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but &Reference[poisoned] for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is &Reference[paralyzed] while poisoned in this way.
2HPk5TdUTeEhD2eG.chat: The Phase Spider attacks with its Bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz.name: Gaseous Form
2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz.description:
You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration. The spell ends if the creature drops to 0 hit points. An incorporeal creature isn't affected.

While in this form, the target's only method of movement is a flying speed of 10 feet. The target can enter and occupy the space of another creature. The target has resistance to nonmagical damage, and it has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. The target can pass through small holes, narrow openings, and even mere cracks, though it treats liquids as though they were solid surfaces. The target can't fall and remains hovering in the air even when stunned or otherwise incapacitated.

While in the form of a misty cloud, the target can't talk or manipulate objects, and any objects it was carrying or holding can't be dropped, used, or otherwise interacted with. The target can't attack or cast spells.
2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz.materials_component: A bit of gauze and a wisp of smoke

2JDxekOVx1NSUwuP.name: Bite
2JDxekOVx1NSUwuP.chat: The Killer Whale attacks with its Bite.

2MKXiCJeOrUJIEto.name: Magic Resistance
2MKXiCJeOrUJIEto.description: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

2NzoIyouATBfPgdc.name: Multiattack
2NzoIyouATBfPgdc.description: The efreeti makes two [[/item .tR7JGJjIz6H1oerb]]{scimitar} attacks or uses its [[/item .9D7vAr8iJbSa4g5N]]{Hurl Flame} twice.

2OUOBIN4TJDoL0sJ.name: Strength Drain
2OUOBIN4TJDoL0sJ.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.
2OUOBIN4TJDoL0sJ.chat: The Shadow attacks with its Strength Drain.

2TDIeRNe4vEJPgi6.name: Legendary Resistance
2TDIeRNe4vEJPgi6.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

2Wh1GHIIzBfCm8md.name: Innate Spellcasting
2Wh1GHIIzBfCm8md.description:
The pit fiend's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 21). The pit fiend can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]]{fireball}

3/day each: [[/item .l9Ju5KE7bbn3WpTm]]{hold monster}, [[/item .X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6]]{wall of fire}

2WoNMpj7w91Dt4fY.name: Legendary Resistance
2WoNMpj7w91Dt4fY.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

2aGoBVVEF54VcC9d.name: Multiattack
2aGoBVVEF54VcC9d.description: The shambling mound makes two [[/item .lOIA9YKQU8xSx7Lj]]{slam} attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is grappled escape DC 14, and the shambling mound uses its [[/item .N42BQALoCmeYphD1]]{Engulf} on it.

2bFCfFfjRNmhyE8A.name: Charm
2bFCfFfjRNmhyE8A.description:
One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must make a [[/save]] saving throw or be magically charmed for 1 day. The charmed target obeys the fiend's verbal or telepathic commands.

If the target suffers any harm or receives a suicidal command, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on a success. If the target successfully saves against the effect, or if the effect on it ends, the target is immune to this fiend's Charm for the next 24 hours.The fiend can have only one target charmed at a time. If it charms another, the effect on the previous target ends.
2bFCfFfjRNmhyE8A.chat: One humanoid the fiend can see within 30 feet of it must make a Wisdom saving throw.

2iPYXoxM2ZReuhSL.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
2iPYXoxM2ZReuhSL.description: The weretiger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

2iRdkvAfbmxSymuw.name: Amorphous
2iRdkvAfbmxSymuw.description: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

2ifhxY5f2Xs4GMxR.name: Split
2ifhxY5f2Xs4GMxR.description: When a jelly that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new jellies if it has at least 10 Hit Points. Each new jelly has Hit Points equal to half the original jelly's, rounded down. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.
2ifhxY5f2Xs4GMxR.chat: The jelly splits into two new jellies. New jellies are one size smaller than the original jelly.

2kBUlTLMlwq3KoUB.name: Divine Awareness
2kBUlTLMlwq3KoUB.description: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

2kHNI1T4gg879fDv.name: Shapechanger
2kHNI1T4gg879fDv.description:
The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid.

Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
2kHNI1T4gg879fDv.chat: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph, or return to its true form.

2m2mkUSBJi2QOZje.name: Multiattack
2m2mkUSBJi2QOZje.description: The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .7QJr0VCtVk2wtZ78]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .P4joxK4BwyYsPfJv]]{claws}. It can make one [[/item .zNDI1LvLKZ9Hi2Ew]]{tail} attack in place of its two claw attacks.

2n8ByeQNl7QkjNVA.name: Heated Body
2n8ByeQNl7QkjNVA.description: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.
2n8ByeQNl7QkjNVA.chat: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes fire damage.

2reHgwNJRFbhmxqA.name: Chain Shirt
2reHgwNJRFbhmxqA.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.

2tzFjiAiXJLEpuCn.name: Innate Spellcasting
2tzFjiAiXJLEpuCn.description:
The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .pub0OWVEB71XQx1n]]{feather fall}, [[/item .MRxldJd6C4bsBo3O]]{levitate}, [[/item .Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]]{light}

3/day each: [[/item .ZPd73HtKF3At11jh]]{control weather}, [[/item .13uVuBQP6VaiSPvC]]{water breathing}

2y0o9wGzCVoBBuDZ.name: Heated Weapons
2y0o9wGzCVoBBuDZ.description: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).
2y0o9wGzCVoBBuDZ.chat: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).

2y826IUSIAgmYf2c.name: Bite
2y826IUSIAgmYf2c.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.
2y826IUSIAgmYf2c.chat: The Giant Frog attacks with its Bite. If successful, the target is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.

2yHXEcrRbadZDr5M.name: Heat Metal
2yHXEcrRbadZDr5M.description:
Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor, that you can see within range. You cause the object to glow red-hot. Any creature in physical contact with the object takes 2d8 fire damage when you cast the spell. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your subsequent turns to cause this damage again.

If a creature is holding or wearing the object and takes the damage from it, the creature must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or drop the object if it can. If it doesn't drop the object, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the start of your next turn.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.
2yHXEcrRbadZDr5M.materials_component: A piece of iron and a flame.

35j2QIMmIk6aEdxj.name: Power Word Stun
35j2QIMmIk6aEdxj.description:
You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range, leaving it dumbfounded. If the target has 150 Hit Points or fewer, it is Stunned. Otherwise, the spell has no effect.

The stunned target must make a Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, this stunning effect ends.

37M4eUyS3kovXqdr.name: Swallow
37M4eUyS3kovXqdr.description:
The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends.

The swallowed target is &Reference[blinded] and &Reference[restrained], it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time.

If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.
37M4eUyS3kovXqdr.chat: The Giant Frog attacks with its Swallow.

38I6bGoguRRefN6W.name: Spellcasting
38I6bGoguRRefN6W.description: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:• Cantrips (at will): [[/item .Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]]{light}, [[/item .n9pJzTDsAwQxJVRl]]{sacred flame}, [[/item .MUO1uYN7JR1hm4dR]]{thaumaturgy}• 1st level (3 slots): [[/item .8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr]]{bless}, [[/item .uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP]]{cure wounds}, [[/item .gvdA9nPuWLck4tBl]]{sanctuary}
38I6bGoguRRefN6W.chat: The acolyte is a spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

3CnWEl3LzMTy99vo.name: Standing Leap
3CnWEl3LzMTy99vo.description: The frog's long jump is up to 10 ft. and its high jump is up to 5 ft., with or without a running start.

3ERjE4pz2bgxXIPi.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
3ERjE4pz2bgxXIPi.description: While in sunlight, the wraith has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

3FIKn37A037kPgzc.name: Constrict
3FIKn37A037kPgzc.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.
3FIKn37A037kPgzc.chat: The Giant Constrictor Snake attacks with its Constrict. The target is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the creature is restrained, and the snake can't constrict another target.

3Fnspq3GjJ5g41lM.name: Fey Ancestry
3Fnspq3GjJ5g41lM.description: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

3Fsct4zbAf7l47Lp.name: Gore
3Fsct4zbAf7l47Lp.chat: The Minotaur Skeleton attacks with its Gore.

3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4.name: Hold Person
3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4.description:
Choose a humanoid that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional humanoid for each slot level above 2nd. The humanoids must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.
3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4.materials_component: A small, straight piece of iron

3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj.name: Calm Emotions
3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj.description:
You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people. Each humanoid in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range must make a Charisma saving throw; a creature can choose to fail this saving throw if it wishes. If a creature fails its saving throw, choose one of the following two effects. You can suppress any effect causing a target to be charmed or frightened. When this spell ends, any suppressed effect resumes, provided that its duration has not expired in the meantime.

Alternatively, you can make a target indifferent about creatures of your choice that it is hostile toward. This indifference ends if the target is attacked or harmed by a spell or if it witnesses any of its friends being harmed. When the spell ends, the creature becomes hostile again, unless the DM rules otherwise.

3OZnNhunvRtPOQmH.name: Identify
3OZnNhunvRtPOQmH.description:
You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell. If it is a magic item or some other magic-imbued object, you learn its properties and how to use them, whether it requires attunement to use, and how many charges it has, if any. You learn whether any spells are affecting the item and what they are. If the item was created by a spell, you learn which spell created it.

If you instead touch a creature throughout the casting, you learn what spells, if any, are currently affecting it.
3OZnNhunvRtPOQmH.materials_component: A pearl worth at least 100gp and an owl feather

3PBv68cIzTlrzcYe.name: Blasphemous Word
3PBv68cIzTlrzcYe.description: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.
3PBv68cIzTlrzcYe.chat: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must make a Constitution saving throw.

3Sr6MrVgbTGw66Aa.name: Variable Illumination
3Sr6MrVgbTGw66Aa.description: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5- to 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

3TD2NpdjIDJxeLl9.name: Tusks (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
3TD2NpdjIDJxeLl9.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be cursed with wereboar lycanthropy.
3TD2NpdjIDJxeLl9.chat: The Wereboar attacks with its Tusks. If the target is a humanoid, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

3UHmbpT3v3FTlplI.name: Claw
3UHmbpT3v3FTlplI.chat: The Young Red Dragon attacks with its Claw.

3WM5UpCTIb6fQaWA.name: Bite
3WM5UpCTIb6fQaWA.chat: The Adult Silver Dragon attacks with its Bite.

3dmAdKAVc8JqLgIj.name: Running Leap
3dmAdKAVc8JqLgIj.description: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can long jump up to 25 ft.

3mtn5D2GoD19WDVW.name: Frightful Presence
3mtn5D2GoD19WDVW.description:
Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
3mtn5D2GoD19WDVW.chat: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 120 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw.

3ovBwWW2b9S8LYId.name: Frightful Presence
3ovBwWW2b9S8LYId.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
3ovBwWW2b9S8LYId.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

3u5Rv7dQ2fIl1rbB.name: Change Shape
3u5Rv7dQ2fIl1rbB.description:
The deva magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the deva's choice).

In a new form, the deva retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks.

3vDo83oAycRGB85G.name: Amphibious
3vDo83oAycRGB85G.description: The giant can breathe air and water.

3wBoA7GvO2fw1Qnu.name: Spider Climb
3wBoA7GvO2fw1Qnu.description: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs.name: Magic Missile
41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs.description:
You create three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of your choice that you can see within range. A dart deals 1d4 + 1 force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and you can direct them to hit one creature or several.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the spell creates one more dart for each slot level above 1st.

42AGHJQzJZfUYxF9.name: Bite
42AGHJQzJZfUYxF9.chat: The Young Blue Dragon attacks with its Bite.

4Cf4U7JMFMCyjw7N.name: Wing Attack
4Cf4U7JMFMCyjw7N.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M.name: Acid Arrow
4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M.description:
A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid. Make a ranged spell Attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes the target with acid for half as much of the initial damage and no damage at the end of its next turn.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage (both initial and later) increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 2nd.
4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M.materials_component: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

4LYRJH02EsSnZUNc.name: Trampling Charge
4LYRJH02EsSnZUNc.description:
If the mammoth moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].

If the target is prone, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.
4LYRJH02EsSnZUNc.chat: If the mammoth moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength saving throw.

4NQZ8XlRj6sbjbOs.name: Change Shape
4NQZ8XlRj6sbjbOs.description:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

4Ntr5H946Prr6gC0.name: Poison Breath
4Ntr5H946Prr6gC0.description: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
4Ntr5H946Prr6gC0.chat: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

4R48w4DH2CqCpmED.name: Charge
4R48w4DH2CqCpmED.description: If the centaur moves at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.
4R48w4DH2CqCpmED.chat: If the centaur moves at least 30 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes extra piercing damage.

4Zbr0ZIgWS4WFshO.name: Blood Frenzy
4Zbr0ZIgWS4WFshO.description: The swarm has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

4fZJqIbZDoAx8Yix.name: Web Walker
4fZJqIbZDoAx8Yix.description: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

4htzOIEvqgitIIL6.name: Regional Effects
4htzOIEvqgitIIL6.description: The mere presence of a legendary creature can have strange and wondrous effects on its environment. Regional effects end abruptly or dissipate over time when the legendary creature dies.

4jztSrWQNxc4q55u.name: Trampling Charge
4jztSrWQNxc4q55u.description: If the triceratops moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone]. If the target is prone, the triceratops can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.
4jztSrWQNxc4q55u.chat: If the triceratops moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength saving throw.

4wbSkOyE4ZqKLPQ6.name: Ephemeral
4wbSkOyE4ZqKLPQ6.description: The will-o'-wisp can't wear or carry anything.

4xg2sYoD5Z4lRmkT.name: Keen Smell
4xg2sYoD5Z4lRmkT.description: The giant has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

50udgXso5dIQmQfv.name: Amphibious
50udgXso5dIQmQfv.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

52m3BQ2wpXvT0jOM.name: Bite
52m3BQ2wpXvT0jOM.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.
52m3BQ2wpXvT0jOM.chat: The Giant Rat (Diseased) attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

542eNLhAx7XYJErk.name: Bite
542eNLhAx7XYJErk.chat: The Adult White Dragon attacks with its Bite.

56yxRgRdOJvr3Hi3.name: Tail Attack
56yxRgRdOJvr3Hi3.chat: The dragon slams its long tail against its foe!

599WNlvXk7snLj4O.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
599WNlvXk7snLj4O.description: The wereboar makes two attacks, only one of which can be with its tusks.

5IEyeZf0FqkPrv7R.name: Amphibious
5IEyeZf0FqkPrv7R.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

5PmQuifZGbPWxAYz.name: Bite
5PmQuifZGbPWxAYz.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
5PmQuifZGbPWxAYz.chat: The Winter Wolf attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

5VhqFROQYjr1P9lp.name: Silence
5VhqFROQYjr1P9lp.description: For the Duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. Any creature or object entirely inside the sphere is immune to thunder damage, and creatures are Deafened while entirely inside it. Casting a Spell that includes a verbal component is impossible there.

5XUFTldfE6mtRUfd.name: Whelm
5XUFTldfE6mtRUfd.description:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failure, a target takes [[/damage average]] damage. If it is Large or smaller, it is also &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained] and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water.

If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.The elemental can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at one time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target grappled by it takes [[/damage average]] damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a [[/check]] check and succeeding.
5XUFTldfE6mtRUfd.chat: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a Strength saving throw. If it is Large or smaller, it is also grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a Strength check and succeeding.

5ZWzJ5OSQh22ueeq.name: Pack Tactics
5ZWzJ5OSQh22ueeq.description: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

5bFYYcQnfN1KtOwr.name: Telepathic Bond
5bFYYcQnfN1KtOwr.description: While the homunculus is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically.

5d7uD5cYAPtlPrWh.name: Flyby
5d7uD5cYAPtlPrWh.description: The snake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

5dpAWzBBJmkzgvGY.name: Tail
5dpAWzBBJmkzgvGY.chat: The Ancient Gold Dragon attacks with its Tail.

5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4.name: Flame Strike
5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4.description:
A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens in a location you specify. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d6 fire damage and 4d6 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (your choice) increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 5th.

5fAK2gZdIiYxLNzK.name: Bite
5fAK2gZdIiYxLNzK.chat: The White Dragon Wyrmling attacks with its Bite.

5kigRXx2FSlzVUWm.name: Multiattack
5kigRXx2FSlzVUWm.description: The vulture makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .t6TG4rgkOXBefYZQ]]{beak} and one with its [[/item .AXKWmB2ZU1hebo5S]]{talons}.

5sDIEn5aplaeXax7.name: Magic Resistance
5sDIEn5aplaeXax7.description: The planetar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

5tEnGK28Rd4nHnwM.name: Petrifying Breath
5tEnGK28Rd4nHnwM.description:
The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw.

On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrified until freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.
5tEnGK28Rd4nHnwM.chat: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

5vCVx0zwz1FKIvTX.name: Breath Weapons
5vCVx0zwz1FKIvTX.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Fire Breath. The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save activity=o8fOmWWIqCYwGu3C]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=o8fOmWWIqCYwGu3C]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Weakening Breath. The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=J4QhEMZOdsyIy2D6]] saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

64Swhse7QnbiLAbi.name: Sting (Bite in Beast Form)
64Swhse7QnbiLAbi.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must make on a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
64Swhse7QnbiLAbi.chat: The Imp attacks with its Sting. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

68Y4sNHbVetQN3wa.name: Fire Breath
68Y4sNHbVetQN3wa.description: The veteran exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
68Y4sNHbVetQN3wa.chat: The veteran exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

6AQXZ1FlO8qhnPTR.name: Water Form
6AQXZ1FlO8qhnPTR.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

6PuULfBzy5vpBSFI.name: Engulf
6PuULfBzy5vpBSFI.description:
The cube moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw.On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

On a failed save, the cube enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and is engulfed. The engulfed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed creature moves with it.An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the cube.
6PuULfBzy5vpBSFI.chat: Whenever the cube enters a creature's space, the creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the cube. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw.

6UWSefP0BqnmYwAz.name: Stomp
6UWSefP0BqnmYwAz.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

6UmjtTyihpEERg1I.name: Pounce
6UmjtTyihpEERg1I.description:
If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].

If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
6UmjtTyihpEERg1I.chat: If the panther moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must make a Strength saving throw.

6VIuuNCntP3W9Tki.name: Amphibious
6VIuuNCntP3W9Tki.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

6ZAh5TkiXwQMUfDB.name: Longsword
6ZAh5TkiXwQMUfDB.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

6aBDwlIsxceFMXxL.name: Swallow
6aBDwlIsxceFMXxL.description:
The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends.

The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 ft. of movement, exiting prone.
6aBDwlIsxceFMXxL.chat: The Giant Toad attacks with its Swallow.

6bromElr0abqNXJL.name: Acid Breath
6bromElr0abqNXJL.description: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
6bromElr0abqNXJL.chat: The dragon exhales acid in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

6dw8RLKtxKrHd41q.name: Web Walker
6dw8RLKtxKrHd41q.description: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

6eqd5bKL0SgwqRnm.name: Multiattack
6eqd5bKL0SgwqRnm.description: The ettercap makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .qpUx52QbFUCSPSln]]{bite} and one with its [[/item .T8XMTiCIOQP4dYEp]]{claws}.

6f3yWYLcONtKe72e.name: Pounce
6f3yWYLcONtKe72e.description:
If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].

If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
6f3yWYLcONtKe72e.chat: If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must make a Strength saving throw.

6gjpG1ezpMNyJDGc.name: Legendary Resistance
6gjpG1ezpMNyJDGc.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

6jQ7YUixkwBq2Fh8.name: Heavy Crossbow
6jQ7YUixkwBq2Fh8.chat: The Veteran attacks with its Heavy Crossbow.

6jw1NtpZQXIesO4Y.name: Talons
6jw1NtpZQXIesO4Y.chat: The Giant Owl attacks with its Talons.

6xCOiR7PxQkaDGY4.name: Keen Hearing
6xCOiR7PxQkaDGY4.description: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

72ha7NWOEA4qIOdY.name: Swarm
72ha7NWOEA4qIOdY.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

72qxug7ywesnINin.name: Disguise Self (any humanoid form)
72qxug7ywesnINin.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing or would feel your head and hair. If you use this spell to appear thinner than you are, the hand of someone who reaches out to touch you would bump into you while it was seemingly still in midair.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use its action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC.

78LbjdfWaZcAqVE7.name: Cold Breath
78LbjdfWaZcAqVE7.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
78LbjdfWaZcAqVE7.chat: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

7AGmP2dRLYmORUX7.name: Death Glare
7AGmP2dRLYmORUX7.description: The hag targets one frightened creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see the hag, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw against this magic or drop to 0 hit points.
7AGmP2dRLYmORUX7.chat: The hag targets one frightened creature she can see within 30 ft. of her. If the target can see the hag, it must make a Wisdom saving throw against this magic.

7GyypGVW1RhhbcqC.name: Tail Spike Regrowth
7GyypGVW1RhhbcqC.description: The manticore has twenty-four tail spikes. Used spikes regrow when the manticore finishes a long rest.

7LCUjJcHm3odI9C8.name: Lightning Breath
7LCUjJcHm3odI9C8.description: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
7LCUjJcHm3odI9C8.chat: The dragon exhales lightning in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

7M1OrMoMMTCEKxta.name: Bite
7M1OrMoMMTCEKxta.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false] for 24 hours. Until this poison ends, the target is &Reference[unconscious apply=false]. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.
7M1OrMoMMTCEKxta.chat: The Couatl attacks with its Bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

7QJr0VCtVk2wtZ78.name: Bite
7QJr0VCtVk2wtZ78.chat: The Dragon Turtle attacks with its Bite.

7XDStiwr5cRAODjk.name: Lightning Breath
7XDStiwr5cRAODjk.description: The dragon exhales lightning in an 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
7XDStiwr5cRAODjk.chat: The dragon exhales lightning in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

7XgQY1kwKPuoWX7t.name: Harpoon
7XgQY1kwKPuoWX7t.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must succeed on a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.
7XgQY1kwKPuoWX7t.chat: The Merrow attacks with its Harpoon. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it must make a Strength contest against the merrow or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the merrow.

7YSwI62Budsr6HzO.name: Multiattack
7YSwI62Budsr6HzO.description: The oni makes two attacks, either with its [[/item .q7J7PERrJb2vxtlt]]{claws} or its [[/item .FC0FNE8O4rnbth8s]]{glaive}.

7a3DRiT1Ku9AnAQO.name: Magic Resistance
7a3DRiT1Ku9AnAQO.description: The glabrezu has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

7buEm5KhI5lP8m1z.name: Guiding Bolt
7buEm5KhI5lP8m1z.description:
A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

7ePnUuyCcRkB5GHo.name: Duergar Resilience
7ePnUuyCcRkB5GHo.description: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

7g1LwEync57GwqV0.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
7g1LwEync57GwqV0.description: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

7gfe5c1qGIvai12V.name: Hellish Rejuvenation
7gfe5c1qGIvai12V.description: A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells sometimes comes back to comes back to life with all its hit points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.
7gfe5c1qGIvai12V.chat: A lemure that dies in the Nine Hells sometimes comes back to life.

7lnXqe8AnWhtnQh7.name: Pincer
7lnXqe8AnWhtnQh7.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature and the chuul doesn't have two other creatures grappled.
7lnXqe8AnWhtnQh7.chat: The Chuul attacks with its Pincer. The target is grappled if it is a Large or smaller creature.

7p94WH1WPMhF1ZP9.name: Smother
7p94WH1WPMhF1ZP9.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature.

Hit: The creature is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.
7p94WH1WPMhF1ZP9.chat: The Rug of Smothering makes a smothering attack! The creature is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating, and the rug can't smother another target.

7pHG1bhYOsbPVvSI.name: Breath Weapons
7pHG1bhYOsbPVvSI.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Cold Breath. The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save activity=U5F5qe2Hu0r0yHmk]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=U5F5qe2Hu0r0yHmk]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Paralyzing Breath. The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 90- foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=9gMvqjbgKK42uyzr]] saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

7qDtYuaBNQ3zOnBC.name: Claw
7qDtYuaBNQ3zOnBC.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 11). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
7qDtYuaBNQ3zOnBC.chat: The Giant Crab attacks with its Claw. The target is grappled.

7xDGPsWicxgP6feT.name: Slam
7xDGPsWicxgP6feT.chat: The Water Elemental attacks with its Slam.

7ycN6rrAEJQP3ZOs.name: Swallow
7ycN6rrAEJQP3ZOs.description:
The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends.

While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

834XVlRwHOXkE2rK.name: Lightning Breath
834XVlRwHOXkE2rK.description: The dragon exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
834XVlRwHOXkE2rK.chat: The dragon exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

86DJipzmvkhxDoKr.name: Legendary Resistance
86DJipzmvkhxDoKr.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

87olpriernjyGLbC.name: Breastplate
87olpriernjyGLbC.description: This armor consists of a fitted metal chest piece worn with supple leather. Although it leaves the legs and arms relatively unprotected, this armor provides good protection for the wearer's vital organs while leaving the wearer relatively unencumbered.

8ATtkPLmg7NooADy.name: Amphibious
8ATtkPLmg7NooADy.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

8EvqvqLumOBhrjeD.name: Bite
8EvqvqLumOBhrjeD.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] and the target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but &Reference[poisoned] for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is &Reference[paralyzed] while poisoned in this way.
8EvqvqLumOBhrjeD.chat: The Giant Centipede attacks with its Bite. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

8FHVwYBJY7dxIv9D.name: Air Form
8FHVwYBJY7dxIv9D.description: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

8GXBUXkbu1e62ZDK.name: Multiattack
8GXBUXkbu1e62ZDK.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .YkCurZ53A7ciRit3]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .eCpXCLFLV7W22orV]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .lsey8RJZiuByt97z]]{claws}.

8Jju4CVZaIDab6Ju.name: Dreadful Glare
8Jju4CVZaIDab6Ju.description:
The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn.

If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.
8Jju4CVZaIDab6Ju.chat: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must make a Wisdom saving throw against this magic.

8LkzioyaScFxfst7.name: Constrict
8LkzioyaScFxfst7.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is grappled (escape [[/check]]). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't constrict another target.
8LkzioyaScFxfst7.chat: The Couatl attacks with its Constrict. The target is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the couatl can't constrict another target.

8NY9Oy7LGoZ1f7gW.name: Studded Leather Armor
8NY9Oy7LGoZ1f7gW.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

8PJAsHmbu6UgDHC0.name: Wind Walk
8PJAsHmbu6UgDHC0.description:
You and up to ten willing creatures you can see within range assume a gaseous form for the Duration, appearing as wisps of cloud. While in this cloud form, a creature has a flying speed of 300 feet and has resistance to damage from nonmagical weapons. The only Actions a creature can take in this form are the Dash action or to revert to its normal form. Reverting takes 1 minute, during which time a creature is Incapacitated and can't move. Until the spell ends, a creature can revert to cloud form, which also requires the 1-minute transformation.

If a creature is in cloud form and flying when the effect ends, the creature descends 60 feet per round for 1 minute until it lands, which it does safely. If it can't land after 1 minute, the creature falls the remaining distance.

8QaMc1baRrSlLFXN.name: Barbed Hide
8QaMc1baRrSlLFXN.description: At the start of each of its turns, the barbed devil deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature grappling it.

8U6fHYSsBSDhYHpr.name: Amphibious
8U6fHYSsBSDhYHpr.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

8VdhUFhUE9m12piC.name: Bite
8VdhUFhUE9m12piC.chat: The Black Bear attacks with its Bite.

8Y7gW0cyZLIzdvQb.name: Amphibious
8Y7gW0cyZLIzdvQb.description: The frog can breathe air and water.

8Yo6JM2NfjkpC8Hz.name: Stone Camouflage
8Yo6JM2NfjkpC8Hz.description: The gnome has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

8ZXdgzpI6WytT63w.name: Cold Breath
8ZXdgzpI6WytT63w.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
8ZXdgzpI6WytT63w.chat: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr.name: Bless
8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr.description:
You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll 1d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

8liUuXPhjNLKYMMx.name: Regeneration
8liUuXPhjNLKYMMx.description: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.
8liUuXPhjNLKYMMx.chat: The oni regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn.

8qYBpaA8c3BuBujY.name: Ink Cloud
8qYBpaA8c3BuBujY.description: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater. The area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, although a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.
8qYBpaA8c3BuBujY.chat: A 5-foot-radius cloud of ink extends all around the octopus if it is underwater.

8s0lGEYZGFEpwt12.name: Illusory Appearance
8s0lGEYZGFEpwt12.description:
The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like an ugly creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The effect ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have no claws, but someone touching her hand might feel the claws. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

8uUyRr6Ho7Yvx8pP.name: Animate Trees
8uUyRr6Ho7Yvx8pP.description:
The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These trees have the same statistics as a treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the Slam action option.

An animated tree acts as an ally of the treant. The tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate tree. The tree then takes root if possible.
8uUyRr6Ho7Yvx8pP.chat: The treant magically animates one or two trees it can see within 60 feet of it.

8yPzMeXvBJC2POQK.name: Innate Spellcasting
8yPzMeXvBJC2POQK.description:
The unicorn's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The unicorn can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

At will: [[/item .Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8]]{detect evil and good}, [[/item .SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo]]{druidcraft}, [[/item .pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj]]{pass without trace}

1/day each: [[/item .3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj]]{calm emotions}, [[/item .TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm]]{dispel evil and good}, [[/item .gMrWeG8fMDPRFiVe]]{entangle}

8zT7njvqbpXs4Cel.name: Spare the Dying
8zT7njvqbpXs4Cel.description: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

91Sw6vOIaO7U8DvM.name: Dominate Person
91Sw6vOIaO7U8DvM.description:
You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range. It must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by you for the duration. If you or creatures that are friendly to you are fighting it, it has advantage on the saving throw.

While the target is charmed, you have a telepathic link with it as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as "Attack that creature," "Run over there," or "Fetch that object." If the creature completes the order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability.

You can use your action to take total and precise control of the target. Until the end of your next turn, the creature takes only the actions you choose, and doesn't do anything that you don't allow it to do. During this time you can also cause the creature to use a reaction, but this requires you to use your own reaction as well.

Each time the target takes damage, it makes a new Wisdom saving throw against the spell. If the saving throw succeeds, the spell ends.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a 6th-level spell slot, the duration is concentration, up to 10 minutes. When you use a 7th-level spell slot, the duration is concentration, up to 1 hour. When you use a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration is concentration, up to 8 hours.

91uPF10lBpn5EOhn.name: Magic Resistance
91uPF10lBpn5EOhn.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

92uVNexE43Z8D18r.name: Spear
92uVNexE43Z8D18r.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

93TfWPoMzBoaneMx.name: Cunning Action
93TfWPoMzBoaneMx.description: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the dash, disengage, or hide action.

93eWZ75LncoC5U8d.name: Longsword
93eWZ75LncoC5U8d.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands.
93eWZ75LncoC5U8d.chat: The Half-Red Dragon Veteran attacks with its Longsword.

963t1Gp9Nsy3UY9D.name: Acid Breath
963t1Gp9Nsy3UY9D.description: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
963t1Gp9Nsy3UY9D.chat: The dragon exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

9D7vAr8iJbSa4g5N.name: Hurl Flame
9D7vAr8iJbSa4g5N.chat: The Efreeti attacks with its Hurl Flame.

9FAl5YGUTmt1RnEF.name: Multiattack
9FAl5YGUTmt1RnEF.description: The devil makes three melee attacks: two with its [[/item .g8r9DZeHyfNzerHP]]{fork} and one with its [[/item .VpvOoT7mbR0XNZiL]]{tail}. It can use [[/item .GFYzWSyeuW9O4a0I]]{Hurl Flame} in place of any melee attack.

9Gf1hal94HjuAHMN.name: Plane Shift (self only)
9Gf1hal94HjuAHMN.description:
You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence. You can specify a target destination in general terms, such as the City of Brass on the Elemental Plane of Fire or the palace of Dispater on the second level of the Nine Hells, and you appear in or near that destination. If you are trying to reach the City of Brass, for example, you might arrive in its Street of Steel, before its Gate of Ashes, or looking at the city from across the Sea of Fire, at the DM's discretion.

Alternatively, if you know the sigil sequence of a teleportation circle on another plane of existence, this spell can take you to that circle. If the teleportation circle is too small to hold all the creatures you transported, they appear in the closest unoccupied spaces next to the circle.

You can use this spell to banish an unwilling creature to another plane. Choose a creature within your reach and make a melee spell attack against it. On a hit, the creature must make a Charisma saving throw. If the creature fails this save, it is transported to a random location on the plane of existence you specify. A creature so transported must find its own way back to your current plane of existence.

9H6ylAxHKFhsfqno.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
9H6ylAxHKFhsfqno.description: The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

9HX1VdEInbRUnBVL.name: Innate Spellcasting
9HX1VdEInbRUnBVL.description:
The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .CAxSzHWizrafT033]]{dancing lights}, [[/item .oIzA2MEHwxhtQneU]]{minor illusion}, [[/item .cdrYKaFi98YWaBMw]]{vicious mockery}

9INT7D1zulhfsok7.name: Heavy Crossbow
9INT7D1zulhfsok7.chat: The Thug attacks with their Heavy Crossbow.

9LXx1CaY98oYrwWK.name: Patchwork Armor
9LXx1CaY98oYrwWK.description: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.

9LzZrzdWIZpjFIGV.name: Divine Eminence
9LzZrzdWIZpjFIGV.description:
As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra [[/damage]] damage to a target on a hit.

This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.
9LzZrzdWIZpjFIGV.chat: As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra radiant damage to a target on a hit.

9OZ6Zm76HXyRSKlP.name: Lair Actions
9OZ6Zm76HXyRSKlP.description: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair. On initiative count 20 (losing all initiative ties), it can use one of its lair action options. It can't do so while incapacitated or otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, it can't use one until after its first turn in the combat.
9OZ6Zm76HXyRSKlP.chat: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair.

9SWi4zPVGsMD5l2Y.name: Chain
9SWi4zPVGsMD5l2Y.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is grappled (escape DC 14) if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes [[/damage activity=7GprfdQsWbexe4iC average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.
9SWi4zPVGsMD5l2Y.chat: The Chain Devil attacks with its Chain. The target is grappled if the devil isn't already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

9T0RdBc0Tvsj6wJW.name: Heavy Club
9T0RdBc0Tvsj6wJW.chat: The Lizardfolk attacks with its Heavy Club.

9aTwUWuZQLhMxjcD.name: Slow
9aTwUWuZQLhMxjcD.description:
The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 ft. of it. Each target must make a [[/save]] saving throw against this magic.

On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
9aTwUWuZQLhMxjcD.chat: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 ft. of it. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw against this magic. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

9d1ZhvT1vIJsNnN1.name: Tentacle Slam
9d1ZhvT1vIJsNnN1.description:
The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be &Reference[stunned apply=false] until the end of the otyugh's next turn.

On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't stunned.
9d1ZhvT1vIJsNnN1.chat: The otyugh slams creatures grappled by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw.

9efeESJpU7Zmfcyo.name: Multiattack
9efeESJpU7Zmfcyo.description: The harpy makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .WqD5jsrWCeNHoD9O]]{claws} and one with its [[/item .ywVQhULZvd4Jn51c]]{club}.

9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe.name: Confusion
9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe.description:
This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled action. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw when you cast this spell or be affected by it.

An affected target can't take reactions and must roll [[/r 1d10]] at the start of each of its turns to determine its behavior for that turn.

d10Behaviour
1The creature uses all its movement to move in a random direction. To determine the direction, roll [[/r 1d8]] and assign a direction to each die face. The creature doesn't take an action this turn.
2-6The creature doesn't move or take actions this turn.
7-8The creature uses its action to make a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach. If there is no creature within its reach, the creature does nothing this turn.
9-10The creature can act and move normally. 

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the radius of the sphere increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 4th.

9hrSczyYfl4fSrpZ.name: Innate Spellcasting
9hrSczyYfl4fSrpZ.description:
The planetar's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 20). The planetar can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8]]{detect evil and good}, invisibility (self only)

3/day each: [[/item .dLJhxDfeyOsc3zsY]]{blade barrier}, [[/item .TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm]]{dispel evil and good}, [[/item .5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]]{flame strike}, [[/item .AGFMPAmuzwWO6Dfz]]{raise dead}

1/day each: [[/item .d54VDyFulD9xxY7J]]{commune}, [[/item .ZPd73HtKF3At11jh]]{control weather}, [[/item .OVikYmSdHliAG2YD]]{insect plague}

9ioH5ocevSRjYBaD.name: Shapechanger
9ioH5ocevSRjYBaD.description: The imp can use its action to polymorph into a beast form that resembles a rat (speed 20 ft.), a raven (20 ft., fly 60 ft.), or a spider (20 ft., climb 20 ft.), or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form, except for the speed changes noted. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

9kqiKxbLXk7Ved3q.name: Innate Spellcasting
9kqiKxbLXk7Ved3q.description:
The glabrezu's spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq]]{darkness}, [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]]{dispel magic}

1/day each: [[/item .9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]]{confusion}, [[/item .yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]]{fly}, [[/item .35j2QIMmIk6aEdxj]]{power word stun}

9v8vBxcPazXyBUmo.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
9v8vBxcPazXyBUmo.description: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

9xaHEynEl0adgcJ4.name: Bite
9xaHEynEl0adgcJ4.chat: The Reef Shark attacks with its Bite.

A3azHlbNcHLRgogu.name: Frightful Presence
A3azHlbNcHLRgogu.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
A3azHlbNcHLRgogu.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv.name: Disguise Self
A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection.
