N42BQALoCmeYphD1.chat: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature grappled by it. The engulfed target is blinded, restrained, and unable to breathe, and it must make a Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it.

N5YFwsrzGuUFrblp.name: Flying Sword
N5YFwsrzGuUFrblp.description: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it. If the solar can see the sword, the solar can mentally command it as a bonus action to fly up to 50 ft. and either make one attack against a target or return to the solar's hands. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it. The hovering sword falls if the solar dies.
N5YFwsrzGuUFrblp.chat: The solar releases its greatsword to hover magically in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of it. If the hovering sword is targeted by any effect, the solar is considered to be holding it.

N86NeUNsfvruyJGq.name: Fist
N86NeUNsfvruyJGq.chat: The Giant Ape attacks with its Fist.

NAyTy2HfzqvHtjRh.name: False Appearance
NAyTy2HfzqvHtjRh.description: While the shrieker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

NB88hf8oRtLwBolX.name: Bite
NB88hf8oRtLwBolX.chat: The Ancient White Dragon attacks with its Bite.

NDE2nul3OiWsL2Hq.name: Underwater Camouflage
NDE2nul3OiWsL2Hq.description: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

NDZ02JVZWMbzRGGJ.name: False Appearance
NDZ02JVZWMbzRGGJ.description: While the ooze remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an oily pool or wet rock.

NMN6cq7RkU8ccxKF.name: Lair Actions
NMN6cq7RkU8ccxKF.description: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair. On initiative count 20 (losing all initiative ties), it can use one of its lair action options. It can't do so while incapacitated or otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, it can't use one until after its first turn in the combat.
NMN6cq7RkU8ccxKF.chat: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair.

NPTnV9YupSeKJrQ0.name: Brute
NPTnV9YupSeKJrQ0.description: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

NPmV7puA7Yg3esqg.name: Undead Fortitude
NPmV7puA7Yg3esqg.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
NPmV7puA7Yg3esqg.chat: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

NTUVjYVsAjweAj1R.name: Bite
NTUVjYVsAjweAj1R.chat: The Giant Badger attacks with its Bite.

NX8cqG6aZMns8wvY.name: Life Drain
NX8cqG6aZMns8wvY.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.
NX8cqG6aZMns8wvY.chat: The Wight attacks with its Life Drain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

NXgSHbDNtVbxsItU.name: Rock
NXgSHbDNtVbxsItU.chat: The Cloud Giant attacks with its Rock.

NYUeQsYqRhROcVMQ.name: Innate Spellcasting
NYUeQsYqRhROcVMQ.description:
The rakshasa's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). The rakshasa can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]]{detect thoughts}, [[/item .A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv]]{disguise self}, [[/item .Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]]{mage hand}, [[/item .oIzA2MEHwxhtQneU]]{minor illusion}

3/day each: [[/item .eS7XnnApoxRxYXPs]]{charm person}, [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]]{invisibility}, [[/item .nslx2nT3p4lNkmdp]]{major image}, [[/item .zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]]{suggestion}

1/day each: [[/item .91Sw6vOIaO7U8DvM]]{dominate person}, [[/item .yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]]{fly}, [[/item .J6Jpw5XzB5aTeqnz]]{plane shift}, [[/item .XzkJpE6XpZfKjODD]]{true seeing}

Na7qo8robmcacNZI.name: Amorphous
Na7qo8robmcacNZI.description: The pudding can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

NgeJhGPvdvOyx7OI.name: Wing Attack
NgeJhGPvdvOyx7OI.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

NhYVY7hHFu2YsFpN.name: Frightful Presence
NhYVY7hHFu2YsFpN.description: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
NhYVY7hHFu2YsFpN.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

NnEyJiIMUFY8ovfl.name: Immutable Form
NnEyJiIMUFY8ovfl.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

NsbkrfEUPw2pbRZ3.name: Amphibious
NsbkrfEUPw2pbRZ3.description: The crab can breathe air and water.

NwivB5zd15WhthVJ.name: Relentless
NwivB5zd15WhthVJ.description: If the wereboar takes 14 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.
NwivB5zd15WhthVJ.chat: If the wereboar takes damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

O8pEyHMhxCwROJ6O.name: Bite
O8pEyHMhxCwROJ6O.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained], and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.
O8pEyHMhxCwROJ6O.chat: The Tyrannosaurus Rex attacks with its Bite. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tyrannosaurus can't bite another target.

O9otNESvCCUdwYhc.name: Multiattack
O9otNESvCCUdwYhc.description: The otyugh makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .CCawltKiVU4Mup9i]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .BPYsBEkmZMcGYZDh]]{tentacles}.

ODM4yi5BKpC4Hohw.name: Underwater Camouflage
ODM4yi5BKpC4Hohw.description: The octopus has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made while underwater.

ODhLKBxLnvvLOnw1.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
ODhLKBxLnvvLOnw1.description:
A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target deals only half damage with weapon attacks that use Strength until the spell ends.

At the end of each of the target's turns, it can make a Constitution saving throw against the spell. On a success, the spell ends.

OE8y8otGDFop6Fzt.name: Pack Tactics
OE8y8otGDFop6Fzt.description: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

OEx9iy4HDipiYsPt.name: Rotting Touch
OEx9iy4HDipiYsPt.chat: The Violet Fungus attacks with its Rotting Touch.

OFL5IcvfcWfE3Vmp.name: Legendary Resistance
OFL5IcvfcWfE3Vmp.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

OJ2b64O3e1nni21W.name: Claw
OJ2b64O3e1nni21W.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 12). The scorpion has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
OJ2b64O3e1nni21W.chat: The Giant Scorpion attacks with its Claw. The target is grappled.

OMZ6qNK1bdpI8ryh.name: Magic Resistance
OMZ6qNK1bdpI8ryh.description: The hag has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

OPXUPzkwhBaLTt7a.name: Spider Climb
OPXUPzkwhBaLTt7a.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

ORrcO13EbgjVvNjA.name: Claw
ORrcO13EbgjVvNjA.chat: The Adult Gold Dragon attacks with its Claw.

OUkdlIHkMVy9284v.name: Legendary Resistance
OUkdlIHkMVy9284v.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

OVikYmSdHliAG2YD.name: Insect Plague
OVikYmSdHliAG2YD.description:
Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The sphere spreads around corners. The sphere remains for the Duration, and its area is lightly obscured. The sphere's area is difficult terrain.

When the area appears, each creature in it must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 4d10 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 5th.
OVikYmSdHliAG2YD.materials_component: A few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat

OdzhvEDeD06BWsZS.name: Fey Charm
OdzhvEDeD06BWsZS.description:
The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be magically &Reference[charmed].

The charmed creature regards the dryad as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the dryad's control, it takes the dryad's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can.Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the dryad dies, is on a different plane of existence from the target, or ends the effect as a bonus action. If a target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to the dryad's Fey Charm for the next 24 hours.The dryad can have no more than one humanoid and up to three beasts charmed at a time.
OdzhvEDeD06BWsZS.chat: The dryad targets one humanoid or beast that she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can see the dryad, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. Each time the dryad or its allies do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw.

OljCWQpwojS4FKur.name: Devil's Sight
OljCWQpwojS4FKur.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the imp's darkvision.

Os0eEymWpLTVR2Xv.name: Blinding Dust
Os0eEymWpLTVR2Xv.description: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.
Os0eEymWpLTVR2Xv.chat: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must make a Constitution saving throw.

OtOJ4eSobUE30d2S.name: Multiattack
OtOJ4eSobUE30d2S.description: The chuul makes two [[/item .7lnXqe8AnWhtnQh7]]{pincer} attacks. If the chuul is grappling a creature, the chuul can also use its [[/item .XUzROtGqVZS61Ofm]]{tentacles} once.

OwNnGHVHu2XX0oPc.name: Web Sense
OwNnGHVHu2XX0oPc.description: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

OyLoUiIl3p2j4p59.name: Bites
OyLoUiIl3p2j4p59.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 1d6 piercing average]] damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
OyLoUiIl3p2j4p59.chat: The Swarm of Poisonous Snakes attacks with a flurry of Bites. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

P0pbiook7Q79UYqQ.name: Heated Body
P0pbiook7Q79UYqQ.description: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

P0ycd36lowML3rTc.name: Claw
P0ycd36lowML3rTc.chat: The Adult Bronze Dragon attacks with its Claw.

P38O0pGKUKXuYgd0.name: Plate Armor
P38O0pGKUKXuYgd0.description: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

P3P1EukfOip32dtd.name: Telepathic Bond
P3P1EukfOip32dtd.description: The fiend ignores the range restriction on its telepathy when communicating with a creature it has charmed. The two don't even need to be on the same plane of existence.

P47jJ8bjQulsbdUg.name: Multiattack
P47jJ8bjQulsbdUg.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .A3azHlbNcHLRgogu]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .amUUCouL69OK1GZU]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .uXxifk618IakGfYG]]{claws}.

P4joxK4BwyYsPfJv.name: Claw
P4joxK4BwyYsPfJv.chat: The Dragon Turtle attacks with its Claw.

PBYkvhJmi5ACi2MO.name: Water Breathing
PBYkvhJmi5ACi2MO.description: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

PGulBR18kfO768c7.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
PGulBR18kfO768c7.description:
The rug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field.

If targeted by dispel magic, the rug must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
PGulBR18kfO768c7.chat: The rug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field.

PHDGDBP8gGjp1XRs.name: Legendary Resistance
PHDGDBP8gGjp1XRs.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

PIXokIK4tYPwua2G.name: Poison Breath
PIXokIK4tYPwua2G.description: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
PIXokIK4tYPwua2G.chat: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

PIggvpkBTTCDGOHp.name: Steadfast
PIggvpkBTTCDGOHp.description: The devil can't be frightened while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

PMXLrGDWGu9amL2X.name: Scale Mail
PMXLrGDWGu9amL2X.description: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.

PQGwUNCJ7EkJAE8V.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
PQGwUNCJ7EkJAE8V.description: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

PVdWTEQBuiAglD7l.name: Whirlwind
PVdWTEQBuiAglD7l.description:
Each creature in the elemental's space must make a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failure, a target takes [[/damage average]] damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone.

If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes [[/damage activity=dnd5eactivity000 average]] damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a [[/save activity=k9fqQYuxbnT3pwT3]] saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked prone.
PVdWTEQBuiAglD7l.chat: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must make a Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

PWqvlPCG9P9edPYi.name: Sure-Footed
PWqvlPCG9P9edPYi.description: The mule has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

PhdUmTsYUeWSSDNN.name: Shapechanger
PhdUmTsYUeWSSDNN.description:
The wererat can use its action to polymorph into a rat-humanoid hybrid or into a giant rat, or back into its true form, which is humanoid.

Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
PhdUmTsYUeWSSDNN.chat: The wererat can use its action to polymorph, or return to its true form.

Pi704hBXv722CLGM.name: Pack Tactics
Pi704hBXv722CLGM.description: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Ps56FcAJxi2L3QdZ.name: Shimmering Shield
Ps56FcAJxi2L3QdZ.description: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

PtGDikGuH6rHkITy.name: Hold Breath
PtGDikGuH6rHkITy.description: The plesiosaurus can hold its breath for 1 hour.

PtPZ5aBQPEfbbvla.name: Spit Poison
PtPZ5aBQPEfbbvla.description: [[/attack extended]]. Hit: The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
PtPZ5aBQPEfbbvla.chat: The Guardian Naga attacks with its Spit Poison. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

Pu7Q4aCRVqVqVkeM.name: Amphibious
Pu7Q4aCRVqVqVkeM.description: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

PvddSEYCJ3fSHEOr.name: Innate Spellcasting
PvddSEYCJ3fSHEOr.description:
The djinni's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8]]{detect evil and good}, [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]]{thunderwave}

3/day each: [[/item .BV0mpbHh29IbbIj5]]{create food and water} (can create wine instead of water), [[/item .gopnZvS0c2jD5FP8]]{tongues}, [[/item .8PJAsHmbu6UgDHC0]]{wind walk}

1/day each: conjure elemental (air elemental only), [[/item .lnaGnxMzpYnbw1uU]]{creation}, [[/item .2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]]{gaseous form}, [[/item .1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]]{invisibility}, [[/item .nslx2nT3p4lNkmdp]]{major image}, [[/item .J6Jpw5XzB5aTeqnz]]{plane shift}

Q3Nd59qtQ5rsGs6c.name: Tail
Q3Nd59qtQ5rsGs6c.chat: The Ancient White Dragon attacks with its Tail.

Q5JDbGOejqXyeaCj.name: Wing Attack
Q5JDbGOejqXyeaCj.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

Q90HYHsZp8MD2iv2.name: False Appearance
Q90HYHsZp8MD2iv2.description: While the tree remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

Q9tHfkUiN6f1sguc.name: Multiattack
Q9tHfkUiN6f1sguc.description: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a [[/item .HebvJc2NqYvdR79s]]{bite} attack.

QAzUtpWvNd9ptDjZ.name: Multiattack
QAzUtpWvNd9ptDjZ.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .nKX7IFrwLJsAsWXU]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .542eNLhAx7XYJErk]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .FhUOX8awKhQrGBV0]]{claws}.

QGNzJqfTHnbhjzFN.name: Change Shape
QGNzJqfTHnbhjzFN.description: The oni magically polymorphs into a Small or Medium humanoid, into a Large giant, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. The only equipment that is transformed is its glaive, which shrinks so that it can be wielded in humanoid form. If the oni dies, it reverts to its true form, and its glaive reverts to its normal size.

QIwTmsNVErWEqzFN.name: Breath Weapons
QIwTmsNVErWEqzFN.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Acid Breath. The dragon exhales acid in an 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save activity=zTWpuajI6meBb52D]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=zTWpuajI6meBb52D]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Slowing Breath. The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=CkPMajPOZWWj3gl0]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

QLJgy1aF5ijBEp4K.name: Bite
QLJgy1aF5ijBEp4K.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
QLJgy1aF5ijBEp4K.chat: The Mastiff attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

QOTQoJFlLIMWmJsu.name: Keen Sight and Smell
QOTQoJFlLIMWmJsu.description: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

QPJWgfVwJ8tu5zsa.name: Swarm
QPJWgfVwJ8tu5zsa.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny quipper. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

QRv2TDbktMG2SBfC.name: Scale Mail
QRv2TDbktMG2SBfC.description: This armor consists of a coat and leggings (and perhaps a separate skirt) of leather covered with overlapping pieces of metal, much like the scales of a fish. The suit includes gauntlets.

QUlBJuNL7JOevT7b.name: Frightful Presence
QUlBJuNL7JOevT7b.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
QUlBJuNL7JOevT7b.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

QWi0q0cSzHEp8VqB.name: Death Burst
QWi0q0cSzHEp8VqB.description: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 ft. of the mephit must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage.
QWi0q0cSzHEp8VqB.chat: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a cloud of steam. Each creature within 5 ft. of the mephit must make a Dexterity saving throw.

QY2OI39oNi9VUuAY.name: Rampage
QY2OI39oNi9VUuAY.description: When the hyena reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the hyena can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

QaRbm71tWEQzR4GK.name: Multiattack
QaRbm71tWEQzR4GK.description: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .vyI1tbobhrYMxj76]]{beak} and one with its [[/item .sh91NilUd5bUZyiG]]{talons}.

Qcgc4zckQ7c1Ky8t.name: Bite
Qcgc4zckQ7c1Ky8t.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.
Qcgc4zckQ7c1Ky8t.chat: The Remorhaz attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

QeobH0xuWk2yWmsb.name: Luring Song
QeobH0xuWk2yWmsb.description:
The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 ft. of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is incapacitated.

While charmed by the harpy, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target must move on its turn toward the harpy by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, the target can repeat the saving throw. A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.

A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.
QeobH0xuWk2yWmsb.chat: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 ft. of the harpy that can hear the song must make a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

Qf6CAZkc7ms4ZY3e.name: Goodberry
Qf6CAZkc7ms4ZY3e.description:
Up to ten berries appear in your hand and are infused with magic for the duration. A creature can use its action to eat one berry. Eating a berry restores 1 hit point, and the berry provides enough nourishment to sustain a creature for one day.

The berries lose their potency if they have not been consumed within 24 hours of the casting of this spell.

QmAWameRMoj0gDKt.name: Magic Resistance
QmAWameRMoj0gDKt.description: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

QrN7UxINx4UCaPIC.name: Claws
QrN7UxINx4UCaPIC.chat: The Steam Mephit attacks with its Claws.

QuVUb9i809rjJWcL.name: Multiattack
QuVUb9i809rjJWcL.description:
The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Melee: [[/item .eL15erXXE9EuXWSB]], [[/item .GrUneCbXCYngdpjf]]

Ranged: [[/item .eL15erXXE9EuXWSB]]

Qzj9HKnvRGhYoggC.name: Reckless
Qzj9HKnvRGhYoggC.description: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

R5sQYgehDyPiDyyE.name: Probing Telepathy
R5sQYgehDyPiDyyE.description: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

R7Vx1RxO8OjXpzQd.name: Multiattack
R7Vx1RxO8OjXpzQd.description: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .CwKQlVkFc2uJW0HL]]{beak} and one with its [[/item .FpbBzMs3wu1NK3Zu]]{claws}.

RADMbiPme1Hrfu8E.name: Create Specter
RADMbiPme1Hrfu8E.description:
The wraith targets a humanoid within 10 feet of it that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute and died violently.

The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the wraith's control. The wraith can have no more than seven specters under its control at one time.
RADMbiPme1Hrfu8E.chat: The target's spirit rises as a specter in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space.

RAnyTfj3CGaiGK3W.name: Consume Life
RAnyTfj3CGaiGK3W.description:
As a bonus action, the will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 ft. of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive.

The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the will-o'-wisp regains 10 (3d6) hit points.
RAnyTfj3CGaiGK3W.chat: The will-o'-wisp can target one creature it can see within 5 ft. The target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw.

RDeCoZRniQBNq0rX.name: Undead Fortitude
RDeCoZRniQBNq0rX.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
RDeCoZRniQBNq0rX.chat: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

RFPDYIhkmBW2B47S.name: Horror Nimbus
RFPDYIhkmBW2B47S.description:
The nalfeshnee magically emits scintillating, multicolored light. Each creature within 15 feet of the nalfeshnee that can see the light must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.
RFPDYIhkmBW2B47S.chat: A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the nalfeshnee's Horror Nimbus for the next 24 hours.

RHezeN7HzNf2oKYP.name: Charm
RHezeN7HzNf2oKYP.description:
The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed by the vampire. The charmed target regards the vampire as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. Although the target isn't under the vampire's control, it takes the vampire's requests or actions in the most favorable way it can, and it is a willing target for the vampire's bite attack.

Each time the vampire or the vampire's companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until the vampire is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.
RHezeN7HzNf2oKYP.chat: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw against this magic.

RKsS1lZwBekMMGMt.name: Multiattack
RKsS1lZwBekMMGMt.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .M3VJyuM63OKH7JH0]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .YauNxZeIeT4uDcTf]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .GQLQiLBrkoOiNc8q]]{claws}.

RLsKLdfdmHajHSwD.name: Vampire Weaknesses
RLsKLdfdmHajHSwD.description:
The vampire has the following flaws:

Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

RMsSkfIx97Hnqf37.name: Siege Monster
RMsSkfIx97Hnqf37.description: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

RTpPc5fs27dBqDuj.name: Blinding Breath
RTpPc5fs27dBqDuj.description: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Referrence[blinded] for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
RTpPc5fs27dBqDuj.chat: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of blinding dust. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

ReMbjfeOKoSj3O79.name: Stoneskin
ReMbjfeOKoSj3O79.description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone. Until the spell ends, the target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
ReMbjfeOKoSj3O79.materials_component: Diamond dust worth 100 gp, which the spell consumes

RgZ4lGrNf9AaIyrG.name: Glaive
RgZ4lGrNf9AaIyrG.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or lose 5 (1d10) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound.

Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 (1d10). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.
RgZ4lGrNf9AaIyrG.chat: The Bearded Devil attacks with its Glaive. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must make a Constitution saving throw. Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful Wisdom (Medicine) check.

Rj3oSInoQMIfHrPc.name: Cold Breath
Rj3oSInoQMIfHrPc.description: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Rj3oSInoQMIfHrPc.chat: The wolf exhales a blast of freezing wind in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

RkuPEGbAXHhxfNWJ.name: Claw
RkuPEGbAXHhxfNWJ.chat: The Pit Fiend attacks with its Claw.

RnLjEUZ0gBxcH2T3.name: Steam Breath
RnLjEUZ0gBxcH2T3.description: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
RnLjEUZ0gBxcH2T3.chat: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of scalding steam. Each creature in that area must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw.

RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA.name: Cone of Cold
RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA.description:
A blast of cold air erupts from your hands. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 8d8 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature killed by this spell becomes a frozen statue until it thaws.

Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 5th.
RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA.materials_component: A small crystal or glass cone

Rr34cx78OgioMSHH.name: Bite
Rr34cx78OgioMSHH.chat: The Adult Brass Dragon attacks with its Bite.

Rrswv9BPB94D3xHQ.name: Amorphous
Rrswv9BPB94D3xHQ.description: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

Rry67emsoMMjvQQz.name: Turn Resistance
Rry67emsoMMjvQQz.description: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

RvZitO1X1j16tABV.name: Pack Tactics
RvZitO1X1j16tABV.description: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

S1RmDd4fOJffOxAy.name: Tail
S1RmDd4fOJffOxAy.chat: The Adult Copper Dragon attacks with its Tail.

S684g3gtaxOsMxME.name: Chain Shirt
S684g3gtaxOsMxME.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.

S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq.name: Darkness
S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq.description:
Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range to fill a 15-foot-radius sphere for the duration. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can't illuminate it.

If the point you choose is on an object you are holding or one that isn't being worn or carried, the darkness emanates from the object and moves with it. Completely covering the source of the darkness with an opaque object, such as a bowl or a helm, blocks the darkness.

If any of this spell's area overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell that created the light is dispelled.
S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq.materials_component: Bat fur and a drop of pitch or piece of coal

SCTJPlV2KrhVflgI.name: Psychic Drain
SCTJPlV2KrhVflgI.description: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes [[/damage average]] damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

SE3xtItC4V2Eckjk.name: Standing Leap
SE3xtItC4V2Eckjk.description: The frog's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

SFmH90jkxaUoPJjk.name: Swarm
SFmH90jkxaUoPJjk.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

SG0kdaxjbJFUtdrJ.name: Legendary Resistance
SG0kdaxjbJFUtdrJ.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

SKwOsrThcwqMXCZv.name: Spear
SKwOsrThcwqMXCZv.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

SLnyx0Ta2ksVM9QL.name: Tentacles
SLnyx0Ta2ksVM9QL.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 10). Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.
SLnyx0Ta2ksVM9QL.chat: The Octopus attacks with its Tentacles. The target is grappled . Until this grapple ends, the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

SQqFFwf2ADQmLaVO.name: Shark Telepathy
SQqFFwf2ADQmLaVO.description: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

SYdqeemFOudCYb9E.name: Pseudopod
SYdqeemFOudCYb9E.chat: The Ochre Jelly attacks with its Pseudopod.

SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo.name: Druidcraft
SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo.description:
Whispering to the spirits of Nature, you create one of the following Effects within range:

  • You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, Falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.
  • You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.
  • You create an Instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as Falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot cube.
  • You instantly light or snuff out a Candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

SiBsPubItj26pcHa.name: Incorporeal Movement
SiBsPubItj26pcHa.description:
The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
SiBsPubItj26pcHa.chat: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

SleYkHovQ8NagmeV.name: Locate Object
SleYkHovQ8NagmeV.description:
Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you. If the object is in motion, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific object known to you, as long as you have seen it up close—within 30 feet—at least once. Alternatively, the spell can locate the nearest object of a particular kind, such as a certain kind of apparel, jewelry, furniture, tool, or weapon.

This spell can't locate an object if any thickness of lead, even a thin sheet, blocks a direct path between you and the object.

SmUCt79LtakgTJoa.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
SmUCt79LtakgTJoa.description:
In humanoid form, the weretiger makes two [[/item .vtnEGCOptmp2bcqG]]{scimitar} attacks or two [[/item .onmNGMiE4AyvYxDQ]]{longbow} attacks.

In hybrid form, it can attack like a humanoid or make two [[/item .HPmjVRKpG08bgohb]]{claw} attacks.

Sn1RpgmvWb3DPz66.name: Multiattack
Sn1RpgmvWb3DPz66.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .m7dF0hheApwoJLpp]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .zMFGBLVpXSZC1Vjm]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .P0ycd36lowML3rTc]]{claws}.

Sp9AkcXsLCN09C9v.name: Brave
Sp9AkcXsLCN09C9v.description: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

StCQbn2czecQteRM.name: Tail Attack
StCQbn2czecQteRM.chat: The dragon slams its long tail against its foe!

SuRAERXystPvC7Ci.name: Bite
SuRAERXystPvC7Ci.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.
SuRAERXystPvC7Ci.chat: The Giant Spider attacks with its Bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

Sv5UJkCfY00yfFOE.name: Web
Sv5UJkCfY00yfFOE.description:
Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], range 30/60 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is &Reference[restrained] by webbing.

As an action, the restrained creature can make a [[/check]] check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, is vulnerable to fire damage and immune to bludgeoning damage.
Sv5UJkCfY00yfFOE.chat: The creature is restrained by webbing. As an action, the restrained creature can make a Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success.

SvFPSD4QGfNEvB0c.name: Hide Armor
SvFPSD4QGfNEvB0c.description: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.

SvpSnbfGzHw6dW0p.name: Tail
SvpSnbfGzHw6dW0p.chat: The Ancient Copper Dragon attacks with its Tail.

Sw2aAeas52cJ4uHZ.name: Lair Actions
Sw2aAeas52cJ4uHZ.description: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair. On initiative count 20 (losing all initiative ties), it can use one of its lair action options. It can't do so while incapacitated or otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, it can't use one until after its first turn in the combat.
Sw2aAeas52cJ4uHZ.chat: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair.

SxVatHq02vURYDt3.name: Nimble Escape
SxVatHq02vURYDt3.description: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

SzwWnAgr25vDeHKu.name: Gibbering
SzwWnAgr25vDeHKu.description:
The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't incapacitated. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a [[/r d8]] to determine what it does during its turn.

On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.
SzwWnAgr25vDeHKu.chat: The mouther babbles incoherently while it can see any creature. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the mouther and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw.

T8xqterWWFewCoot.name: Divine Awareness
T8xqterWWFewCoot.description: The solar knows if it hears a lie.

TB52r9CGyQ5lewor.name: Regional Effects
TB52r9CGyQ5lewor.description: The mere presence of a legendary creature can have strange and wondrous effects on its environment. Regional effects end abruptly or dissipate over time when the legendary creature dies.

TEgU7pKAAA0f35Yw.name: Sneak Attack
TEgU7pKAAA0f35Yw.description: The spy deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

TKV9mS1lvqMAyCaB.name: Bite
TKV9mS1lvqMAyCaB.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]]. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw against disease or become &Reference[poisoned] until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 (1d10) on a failure. This reduction lasts until the disease is cured. The creature dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
TKV9mS1lvqMAyCaB.chat: The Death Dog attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw. Every 24 hours that elapse, the creature must repeat the saving throw.

TKztZERtXehbxu2q.name: Hold Breath
TKztZERtXehbxu2q.description: While out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

TSmET06nE61H6HC2.name: Charge
TSmET06nE61H6HC2.description:
If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
TSmET06nE61H6HC2.chat: If the boar moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes extra slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

TT2YmAw82Sj1WNKn.name: Magic Weapons
TT2YmAw82Sj1WNKn.description: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

TUvgGNvTgO6MlepM.name: Multiattack
TUvgGNvTgO6MlepM.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .v92F1DGzRWSEMPxH]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .tx5M41t7JlSuVQ9R]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .ORrcO13EbgjVvNjA]]{claws}.

TXjalusRqJTJKFCq.name: Breath Weapons
TXjalusRqJTJKFCq.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Acid Breath. The dragon exhales acid in an 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save activity=zTWpuajI6meBb52D]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=zTWpuajI6meBb52D]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Slowing Breath. The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=CkPMajPOZWWj3gl0]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a successful save.

TePImx0XTnaVC3HB.name: Keen Sight
TePImx0XTnaVC3HB.description: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

TgHsuhNasPbhu8MO.name: Guardian of Faith
TgHsuhNasPbhu8MO.description:
A Large Spectral Guardian appears and hovers for the Duration in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The guardian occupies that space and is indistinct except for a gleaming sword and shield emblazoned with the symbol of your deity.

Any creature hostile to you that moves to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 20 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The guardian vanishes when it has dealt a total of 60 damage.

ThVO3VFsGgg3GLc5.name: Multiattack
ThVO3VFsGgg3GLc5.description: The drider makes three attacks, either with its [[/item .xqwxVn28J0zx8Y7H]]{longsword} or its [[/item .3XAtYmmaED1rxaaE]]{longbow}. It can replace one of those attacks with a [[/item .rUvv8Vnh7XbqbCLd]]{bite} attack.

Ti3XQOmTKdgcnpAa.name: Leather Armor
Ti3XQOmTKdgcnpAa.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

TiKtAuqd6urQ45Ds.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
TiKtAuqd6urQ45Ds.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

TizBVS6hRuBa8JYY.name: Charge (Boar or Hybrid Form Only)
TizBVS6hRuBa8JYY.description:
If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
TizBVS6hRuBa8JYY.chat: If the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with its tusks on the same turn, the target takes extra slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make aStrength saving throw or be knocked prone.

TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm.name: Dispel Evil and Good
TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm.description:
Shimmering energy surrounds and protects you from fey, Undead, and creatures originating from Beyond the Material Plane. For the Duration, Celestials, Elementals, fey, Fiends, and undead have disadvantage on Attack rolls against you.

You can end the spell early by using either of the following special functions.

Break Enchantment. As your action, you touch a creature you can reach that is Charmed, Frightened, or possessed by a Celestial, an elemental, a fey, a fiend, or an Undead. The creature you touch is no longer charmed, frightened, or possessed by such creatures.

Dismissal. As your action, make a melee spell Attack against a Celestial, an elemental, a fey, a fiend, or an Undead you can reach. On a hit, you attempt to drive the creature back to its home plane. The creature must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be sent back to its home plane (if it isn't there already). If they aren't on their home plane, undead are sent to the Shadowfell, and fey are sent to the Feywild.
TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm.materials_component: Holy water or powdered silver and iron

Tm2NY0eSI6InRcsa.name: Greatclub
Tm2NY0eSI6InRcsa.chat: The Stone Giant attacks with its Greatclub.

TtrZUBPjTrxKxoFn.name: Trampling Charge
TtrZUBPjTrxKxoFn.description: If the elephant moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone]. If the target is prone, the elephant can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.
TtrZUBPjTrxKxoFn.chat: If the elephant moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a Strength saving throw.

TwdKEVj1NjVefyq9.name: Amphibious
TwdKEVj1NjVefyq9.description: The hag can breathe air and water.

U66PTM15QvmkenvW.name: Relentless
U66PTM15QvmkenvW.description: If the boar takes 7 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead. Recharges on a short or long rest.
U66PTM15QvmkenvW.chat: If the boar takes damage that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

UDUnlfPsOAbq2RSE.name: Blur
UDUnlfPsOAbq2RSE.description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you. For the duration, any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against you. An attacker is immune to this effect if it doesn't rely on sight, as with blindsight, or can see through illusions, as with truesight.

UF0mfYsgI4ay6mzv.name: Possession
UF0mfYsgI4ay6mzv.description:
One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 ft. of it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness.

The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies.The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.
UF0mfYsgI4ay6mzv.chat: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 ft. of it must make a Charisma saving throw.

UGfL5qnzzi2y2pNj.name: Multiattack
UGfL5qnzzi2y2pNj.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .sYtyFXYWqxWT1uUI]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .NB88hf8oRtLwBolX]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .Cz5xqvQ50f5zxuNY]]{claws}.

UMoMhboTLq75ZJW8.name: Spellcasting
UMoMhboTLq75ZJW8.description:
The lich is an 18th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 20, +12 to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): [[/item .Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]]{mage hand}, [[/item .udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ]]{prestidigitation}, [[/item .ctW81uiX56xZR2c5]]{ray of frost}

1st level (4 slots): [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]]{magic missile}, [[/item .z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]]{shield}, [[/item .WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ]]{thunderwave}

2nd level (3 slots): [[/item .ppWAAEul0QHtm4er]]{detect thoughts}, [[/item .1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]]{invisibility}, [[/item .4H6YgYdKgnX6ZQ8M]]{acid arrow}, [[/item .X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz]]{mirror image}

3rd level (3 slots): [[/item .oyE5nVppa5mde5gT]]{animate dead}, [[/item .Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]]{counterspell}, [[/item .15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]]{dispel magic}, [[/item .ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]]{fireball}

4th level (3 slots): [[/item .pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y]]{blight}, [[/item .A4RsPuSvB9wFtz1j]]{dimension door}

5th level (3 slots): [[/item .LkvI11Uue774QBKZ]]{cloudkill}, [[/item .fVbCxFRaORalHB20]]{scrying}

6th level (1 slot): [[/item .HBHbOGKNVVprSlwn]]{disintegrate}, [[/item .WmQpxfjZwF3MGUby]]{globe of invulnerability}

7th level (1 slot): [[/item .HPvZm8YJO91k6Qdg]]{finger of death}, [[/item .J6Jpw5XzB5aTeqnz]]{plane shift}

8th level (1 slot): [[/item .eEpy1ONlXumKS1mp]]{dominate monster}, [[/item .35j2QIMmIk6aEdxj]]{power word stun}

9th level (1 slot): [[/item .dmvaMLFWFtv0qx0S]]{power word kill}
UMoMhboTLq75ZJW8.chat: The lich is an spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

UNbcqlW8Siek0Fpm.name: Hooves
UNbcqlW8Siek0Fpm.description: The unicorn makes one attack with its [[/item .f7m44y4TqYYcunMj]]{hooves}.

USl5HDilKxVI4BHh.name: Multiattack
USl5HDilKxVI4BHh.description: The hydra makes as many [[/item .fYE4f0Oa2I0MetId]]{bite} attacks as it has heads.

UUapff5kwkff2TJP.name: Regional Effects
UUapff5kwkff2TJP.description: The mere presence of a legendary creature can have strange and wondrous effects on its environment. Regional effects end abruptly or dissipate over time when the legendary creature dies.

UYqrfrW4pmBsmtiQ.name: Phantasms
UYqrfrW4pmBsmtiQ.description:
The cloaker magically creates three illusory duplicates of itself if it isn't in bright light. The duplicates move with it and mimic its actions, shifting position so as to make it impossible to track which cloaker is the real one. If the cloaker is ever in an area of bright light, the duplicates disappear.

Whenever any creature targets the cloaker with an attack or a harmful spell while a duplicate remains, that creature rolls randomly to determine whether it targets the cloaker or one of the duplicates. A creature is unaffected by this magical effect if it can't see or if it relies on senses other than sight.

A duplicate has the cloaker's AC and uses its saving throws. If an attack hits a duplicate, or if a duplicate fails a saving throw against an effect that deals damage, the duplicate disappears.

UfsuvLGCWiYxrys1.name: Echolocation
UfsuvLGCWiYxrys1.description: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

UjT93YD55B87gMqZ.name: Steam Breath
UjT93YD55B87gMqZ.description:
The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.
UjT93YD55B87gMqZ.chat: The dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

Um3cK4i4ZQSTqodb.name: Claws (Hag Form Only)
Um3cK4i4ZQSTqodb.chat: The Night Hag attacks with its Claws.

UnONIXYgZcE3Jya0.name: Bite
UnONIXYgZcE3Jya0.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
UnONIXYgZcE3Jya0.chat: The Worg attacks with its Bite. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Uo4oxB1xZmJcWVsZ.name: Multiattack
Uo4oxB1xZmJcWVsZ.description: The worm makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .dlzFJ5UjbMAfJ6Sb]]{bite} and one with its stinger.

Uox2GEp5GMXOOXOc.name: Frightening Gaze
Uox2GEp5GMXOOXOc.description: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become grappled for 1 minute. The grappled target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.
Uox2GEp5GMXOOXOc.chat: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw.

Up2YzkDn0uBKQj6K.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
Up2YzkDn0uBKQj6K.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

UqpaWsGVgiCMSZEw.name: Spear
UqpaWsGVgiCMSZEw.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands.

Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3.name: Mage Hand
Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3.description:
A spectral, floating hand appears at a point you choose within range. The hand lasts for the duration or until you dismiss it as an action. The hand vanishes if it is ever more than 30 feet away from you or if you cast this spell again.

You can use your action to control the hand. You can use the hand to manipulate an object, open an unlocked door or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, or pour the contents out of a vial. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.

The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

UwlU9Zhwf94gPX0n.name: Keen Smell
UwlU9Zhwf94gPX0n.description: The wererat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Ux1Gv0S29JzRaD27.name: Multiattack
Ux1Gv0S29JzRaD27.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .0Ob35HZxhSF7p2ys]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .WvvHslcDhMq7MD1s]]{claws}.

V0O6My4SjXUmirH6.name: Cast a Spell
V0O6My4SjXUmirH6.description: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

VJz6sW3vOJcEL4IS.name: Healing Touch
VJz6sW3vOJcEL4IS.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 ([[/heal]]{6d8 + 3}) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.
VJz6sW3vOJcEL4IS.chat: The planetar touches another creature. The target magically regains 30 (6d8 + 3) hit points and is freed from any curse, disease, poison, blindness, or deafness.

VcVWWSlfTBeXWh3T.name: Split
VcVWWSlfTBeXWh3T.description: When a pudding that is Medium or larger is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two new puddings if it has at least 10 Hit Points. Each new pudding has Hit Points equal to half the original pudding's, rounded down. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.
VcVWWSlfTBeXWh3T.chat: The pudding splits into two new puddings. New puddings are one size smaller than the original pudding.

VdFnTF9MqUFF7KPQ.name: Faultless Tracker
VdFnTF9MqUFF7KPQ.description: The stalker is given a quarry by its summoner. The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence. The stalker also knows the location of its summoner.
VdFnTF9MqUFF7KPQ.chat: The stalker knows the direction and distance to its quarry as long as the two of them are on the same plane of existence.

Vdk7dsybx2iYlKVx.name: Rake
Vdk7dsybx2iYlKVx.chat: The Awakened Shrub attacks with its Rake.

VkCVMF2SvsuYWWYg.name: Tail
VkCVMF2SvsuYWWYg.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
VkCVMF2SvsuYWWYg.chat: The Giant Crocodile attacks with its Tail. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw.

VkmpLaL0RYt8WrzR.name: Bite
VkmpLaL0RYt8WrzR.chat: The Blue Dragon Wyrmling attacks with its Bite.

VlNQwm636T7qIEoQ.name: Tail
VlNQwm636T7qIEoQ.chat: The Ancient Silver Dragon attacks with its Tail.

VlvfR7YD6twoSRhg.name: Amphibious
VlvfR7YD6twoSRhg.description: The hag can breathe air and water.

VmQbXjALjJwKhT91.name: Multiattack
VmQbXjALjJwKhT91.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .IiZoBYBEjE5gGjeD]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .qRuJSlOzJITBzcjv]]{claws}.

Vmmq0dqa2hEcTGOC.name: Swarm
Vmmq0dqa2hEcTGOC.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny raven. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

VpvOoT7mbR0XNZiL.name: Tail
VpvOoT7mbR0XNZiL.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or lose 10 (3d6) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 (3d6). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Medicine) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.
VpvOoT7mbR0XNZiL.chat: The Horned Devil attacks with its Tail. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

Vq0dUbodqBggQAVQ.name: Bite
Vq0dUbodqBggQAVQ.chat: The Bronze Dragon Wyrmling attacks with its Bite.

VtIk8lLDM4Qj3uOl.name: Cold Breath
VtIk8lLDM4Qj3uOl.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
VtIk8lLDM4Qj3uOl.chat: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

Vu2UkFmxzWB17KtN.name: Tail
Vu2UkFmxzWB17KtN.chat: The Ancient Bronze Dragon attacks with its Tail.

VzgFzcmocr1X1cp4.name: Shillelagh
VzgFzcmocr1X1cp4.description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8. The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn't already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon.
VzgFzcmocr1X1cp4.materials_component: A shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff

W4Qx5z0id6da0vqg.name: Legend Lore
W4Qx5z0id6da0vqg.description:
Name or describe a person, place, or object. The spell brings to your mind a brief summary of the significant lore about the thing you named. The lore might consist of current tales, forgotten stories, or even secret lore that has never been widely known. If the thing you named isn't of legendary importance, you gain no information. The more information you already have about the thing, the more precise and detailed the information you receive is.

The information you learn is accurate but might be couched in figurative language. For example, if you have a mysterious magic axe on hand, the spell might yield this information: "Woe to the evildoer whose hand touches the axe, for even the haft slices the hand of the evil ones. Only a true Child of Stone, lover and beloved of Moradin, may awaken the true powers of the axe, and only with the sacred word Rudnogg on the lips."
W4Qx5z0id6da0vqg.materials_component: Incense worth at least 250gp, which the spell consumes, and four ivory strips worth at least 50gp each.

W5ceTePXIPlUuiEY.name: Teleport
W5ceTePXIPlUuiEY.description: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 feet of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.
W5ceTePXIPlUuiEY.chat: The unicorn magically teleports itself and up to three willing creatures it can see within 5 ft. of it, along with any equipment they are wearing or carrying, to a location the unicorn is familiar with, up to 1 mile away.

W7sEr3m8MBrzYq2v.name: Parry
W7sEr3m8MBrzYq2v.description: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee Attack that would hit it. To do so, the erinyes must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
W7sEr3m8MBrzYq2v.chat: The erinyes adds 4 to its AC against one melee Attack that would hit it.

WAGF3evP6GTYDvM0.name: Devil's Sight
WAGF3evP6GTYDvM0.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's darkvision.

WAglSb6wsm8V1iCd.name: Poison Breath
WAglSb6wsm8V1iCd.description: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
WAglSb6wsm8V1iCd.chat: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

WEesSpitzLnaCknL.name: Slam
WEesSpitzLnaCknL.chat: The Awakened Tree attacks with its Slam.

WFfPQjdkfYdIIiZT.name: Innate Spellcasting
WFfPQjdkfYdIIiZT.description:
The giant's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]]{fog cloud}, [[/item .Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]]{light}

3/day each: [[/item .pub0OWVEB71XQx1n]]{feather fall}, [[/item .yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]]{fly}, [[/item .wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]]{misty step}, [[/item .HQfd7jJyULIoGxrZ]]{telekinesis}

1/day each: [[/item .ZPd73HtKF3At11jh]]{control weather}, [[/item .2IWiZAJtOGDoKjiz]]{gaseous form}

WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH.name: Ice Storm
WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH.description:
A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high Cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Hailstones turn the storm's area of effect into difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.
WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH.materials_component: A pinch of dust and a few drops of water

WRygAnkpMeaqiw70.name: Heated Weapons
WRygAnkpMeaqiw70.description: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage (included in the attack).
WRygAnkpMeaqiw70.chat: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals extra fire damage (included in the attack).

WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ.name: Thunderwave
WTbOQBsarsL1LuXJ.description:
A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from you must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 2d8 thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from you. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

In addition, unsecured objects that are completely within the area of effect are automatically pushed 10 feet away from you by the spell's effect, and the spell emits a thunderous boom audible out to 300 feet.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

WYt9oaIl8PZrMDNl.name: Magic Resistance
WYt9oaIl8PZrMDNl.description: The solar has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WZ3XGh48UoyAvBhS.name: Longsword
WZ3XGh48UoyAvBhS.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands.

Wa6dckSFp3pY8yH5.name: Magic Resistance
Wa6dckSFp3pY8yH5.description: The archmage has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

WaEunPCFG0EddNTt.name: Longsword
WaEunPCFG0EddNTt.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands.

WahI41a3goVUg0x1.name: Enlarge/Reduce
WahI41a3goVUg0x1.description:
You cause a creature or an object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the Duration. Choose either a creature or an object that is neither worn nor carried. If the target is unwilling, it can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell has no effect.

If the target is a creature, everything it is wearing and carrying changes size with it. Any item dropped by an affected creature returns to normal size at once.

Enlarge. The target's size doubles in all dimensions, and its weight is multiplied by eight. This growth increases its size by one category—from Medium to Large, for example. If there isn't enough room for the target to double its size, the creature or object attains the maximum possible size in the space available. Until the spell ends, the target also has advantage on Strength Checks and Strength Saving Throws. The target's Weapons also grow to match its new size. While these Weapons are enlarged, the target's attacks with them deal 1d4 extra damage.

Reduce. The target's size is halved in all dimensions, and its weight is reduced to one-eighth of normal. This reduction decreases its size by one category—from Medium to Small, for example. Until the spell ends, the target also has disadvantage on Strength Checks and Strength Saving Throws. The target's Weapons also shrink to match its new size. While these Weapons are reduced, the target's attacks with them deal 1d4 less damage (this can't reduce the damage below 1).

WharT2ReFy2FYTG0.name: Magic Resistance
WharT2ReFy2FYTG0.description: The erinyes has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Whn4pPAB1YSnvocN.name: Multiattack
Whn4pPAB1YSnvocN.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .LQKBexRS91dTMEKa]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .nOBAY4ulYbWMc8Pz]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .AheA06jKecElYrVt]]{claws}.

WjqNhFTYP9w4gGHd.name: Turn Defiance
WjqNhFTYP9w4gGHd.description: The ghast and any ghouls within 30 ft. of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

Wkv8laBNYgkdA7lL.name: Innate Spellcasting
Wkv8laBNYgkdA7lL.description:
The dryad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 14). The dryad can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo]]{druidcraft}

3/day each: [[/item .gMrWeG8fMDPRFiVe]]{entangle}, [[/item .Qf6CAZkc7ms4ZY3e]]{goodberry}

1/day each: [[/item .JPwIEfgUPVebr5AH]]{barkskin}, [[/item .pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj]]{pass without trace}, [[/item .VzgFzcmocr1X1cp4]]{shillelagh}

WlaPkHNlq3vBfxnk.name: Hide Armor
WlaPkHNlq3vBfxnk.description: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.

WmQpxfjZwF3MGUby.name: Globe of Invulnerability
WmQpxfjZwF3MGUby.description:
An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you and remains for the Duration.

Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or Objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and Objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such Spells.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the barrier blocks Spells of one level higher for each slot level above 6th.
WmQpxfjZwF3MGUby.materials_component: A glass or crystal bead that shatters when the spell ends

Wpa7li8EJJJ7W3kA.name: Enslave
Wpa7li8EJJJ7W3kA.description:
The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be magically &Reference[charmed] by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target.

The charmed target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.Whenever the charmed target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.
Wpa7li8EJJJ7W3kA.chat: The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. Whenever the target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

WqOflwn1ubAMkGdQ.name: Rejuvenation
WqOflwn1ubAMkGdQ.description: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.
WqOflwn1ubAMkGdQ.chat: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its hit points.

Wr6BSqrXAJZu28sp.name: Multiattack
Wr6BSqrXAJZu28sp.description: The manticore makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .thSJXAlyfHGmVWN5]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .4WFf0M2tCPwiLPxG]]{claws} or three with its [[/item .bYJjJPKhiDOTMlmS]]{tail spikes}.

WvvHslcDhMq7MD1s.name: Claw
WvvHslcDhMq7MD1s.chat: The Young Green Dragon attacks with its Claw.

WyxVuCp4iU10bA7m.name: Etherealness
WyxVuCp4iU10bA7m.description: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk.name: Greater Restoration
WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk.description:
You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target's Exhaustion level by one, or end one of the following Effects on the target:

  • One effect that Charmed or Petrified the target
  • One curse, including the target's Attunement to a cursed magic item
  • Any reduction to one of the target's Ability Scores
  • One effect reducing the target's hit point maximum
WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk.materials_component: diamond dust worth at least 100gp, which the spell consumes

X1d4jzEXKYOuvEjT.name: Tail
X1d4jzEXKYOuvEjT.chat: The Ancient Green Dragon attacks with its Tail.

X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6.name: Wall of Fire
X3DrXgxjwI2dvkD6.description:
You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range. You can make the wall up to 60 feet long, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick, or a ringed wall up to 20 feet in diameter, 20 feet high, and 1 foot thick. The wall is opaque and lasts for the duration.

When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5d8 fire damage, or half as much damage on a successful save.

One side of the wall, selected by you when you cast this spell, deals 5d8 fire damage to each creature that ends its turn within 10 feet of that side or inside the wall. A creature takes the same damage when it enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there. The other side of the wall deals no damage.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz.name: Mirror Image
X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz.description:
Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space. Until the spell ends, the duplicates move with you and mimic your actions, shifting position so it's impossible to track which image is real. You can use your action to dismiss the illusory duplicates.

Each time a creature targets you with an attack during the spell's duration, roll a [[/r 1d20 # Mirror Image Check]] to determine whether the attack instead targets one of your duplicates.

If you have three duplicates, you must roll a 6 or higher to change the attack's target to a duplicate. With two duplicates, you must roll an 8 or higher. With one duplicate, you must roll an 11 or higher.

A duplicate's AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier. If an attack hits a duplicate, the duplicate is destroyed. A duplicate can be destroyed only by an attack that hits it. It ignores all other damage and effects. The spell ends when all three duplicates are destroyed.

A creature is unaffected by this spell if it can't see, if it relies on senses other than sight, such as blindsight, or if it can perceive illusions as false, as with truesight.

X78NpT0YZG0rZcaP.name: Spider Climb
X78NpT0YZG0rZcaP.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

X7cYMwpdqWU6j4kt.name: Wing Attack
X7cYMwpdqWU6j4kt.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

X8w9EzYLGc4vQ1H2.name: Animal Messenger
X8w9EzYLGc4vQ1H2.description:
