iBhjlawEB5iwUmoS.name: Rampage
iBhjlawEB5iwUmoS.description: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

iFHGL8wlqBtZAdHr.name: Sting
iFHGL8wlqBtZAdHr.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[poisoned] for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success .
iFHGL8wlqBtZAdHr.chat: The Bone Devil attacks with its Sting. the target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success .

iGge3BzjEfpSeaxP.name: Bite
iGge3BzjEfpSeaxP.chat: The Red Dragon Wyrmling attacks with its Bite.

iGuyFLbKazqPCcXY.name: Reel
iGuyFLbKazqPCcXY.chat: The roper pulls each creature grappled by it up to 25 ft. straight toward it.

iQt3J3ZnHDoeaEIR.name: Illumination
iQt3J3ZnHDoeaEIR.description: The elemental sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in an additional 30 ft..

iRRniNGmcgkUi4oH.name: Multiattack
iRRniNGmcgkUi4oH.description: The devil makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .ndwCjJFBLTujojCl]]{beard} and one with its [[/item .RgZ4lGrNf9AaIyrG]]{glaive}.

iSMssiqxkZFEt2ch.name: Amphibious
iSMssiqxkZFEt2ch.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

iWDQPwdffkW06c2Y.name: Charge
iWDQPwdffkW06c2Y.description:
If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked prone.
iWDQPwdffkW06c2Y.chat: If the unicorn moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a horn attack on the same turn, the target takes extra piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

iXcyU8grGuxZbkYJ.name: Blinding Gaze
iXcyU8grGuxZbkYJ.description: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[blinded apply=false] until magic such as lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.
iXcyU8grGuxZbkYJ.chat: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be blinded.

iXhbFt7gCj3FBM2r.name: Fire Breath
iXhbFt7gCj3FBM2r.description: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
iXhbFt7gCj3FBM2r.chat: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

iYlIoEDfSCrggrca.name: Multiattack
iYlIoEDfSCrggrca.description: The centaur makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .uhqyN44IRWXixgxU]]{pike} and one with its [[/item .ICbiLFrPjwIfA1Nj]]{hooves} or two with its [[/item .v7ForWMLPJp1u78X]]{longbow}.

idILnIUj76QH9v8w.name: Incorporeal Movement
idILnIUj76QH9v8w.description:
The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
idILnIUj76QH9v8w.chat: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

ieLtcJMAlgYVDSvs.name: Keen Smell
ieLtcJMAlgYVDSvs.description: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

ik1IkSZi4fpiGbB3.name: Rotting Fist
ik1IkSZi4fpiGbB3.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or other magic.
ik1IkSZi4fpiGbB3.chat: The Mummy attacks with its Rotting Fist. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

iqduxJQPzhHPTJp2.name: Claw
iqduxJQPzhHPTJp2.chat: The Ancient Gold Dragon attacks with its Claw.

irNLCfkryOmVWf25.name: Tail
irNLCfkryOmVWf25.chat: The Adult Bronze Dragon attacks with its Tail.

is4wHu9FG6SPackl.name: Longsword
is4wHu9FG6SPackl.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands.

iw2q07K1D0X01DZO.name: Change Shape
iw2q07K1D0X01DZO.description:
The couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the couatl's choice).

In a new form, the couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the couatl can use its bite in that form.

iwN0z7f5LF9AAbRJ.name: Greatsword
iwN0z7f5LF9AAbRJ.chat: The Storm Giant attacks with its Greatsword.

j2nbvKIkKdNI32hU.name: Breath Weapons
j2nbvKIkKdNI32hU.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Fire Breath. The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save activity=o8fOmWWIqCYwGu3C]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=o8fOmWWIqCYwGu3C]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Weakening Breath. The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=J4QhEMZOdsyIy2D6]] saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

j4xzhdYjtz2migUE.name: Multiattack
j4xzhdYjtz2migUE.description: The kraken makes three [[/item .lfg28JvVAru30yJ4]]{tentacle} attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of [[/item .bwwyMBn4QwiNd4SM]]{Fling}.

jDA6wujGF6L3tPBM.name: Hooves
jDA6wujGF6L3tPBM.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], 5 ft., one prone creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.
jDA6wujGF6L3tPBM.chat: The Giant Elk attacks with its Hooves.

jFBgpP0EO1Y2HRL0.name: Claws
jFBgpP0EO1Y2HRL0.chat: The Polar Bear attacks with its Claws.

jFoGi81ljGK27zpX.name: Blood Frenzy
jFoGi81ljGK27zpX.description: The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

jGCUdUnQs3nyBZLD.name: Swarm
jGCUdUnQs3nyBZLD.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

jLzmwSFLsR0jhWHF.name: Bite
jLzmwSFLsR0jhWHF.chat: The Adult Copper Dragon attacks with its Bite.

jW4qHQ761qRLeWM8.name: Pounce (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
jW4qHQ761qRLeWM8.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a [[/item .HPmjVRKpG08bgohb]]{claw} attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone]. If the target is prone, the weretiger can make one [[/item .FOkSL18gU0Sli5ZA]]{bite} attack against it as a bonus action.
jW4qHQ761qRLeWM8.chat: If the weretiger moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

jYBYvv9EF1UnOvqZ.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
jYBYvv9EF1UnOvqZ.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target (escape DC 18).
jYBYvv9EF1UnOvqZ.chat: The Vampire attacks with its Unarmed Strike.

jZ6JNykRtdQ90MOo.name: Shield of Faith
jZ6JNykRtdQ90MOo.description: A shimmering field appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.
jZ6JNykRtdQ90MOo.materials_component: A small parchment with a bit of holy text written on it.

jZeQHAOQV365hmZF.name: Magic Resistance
jZeQHAOQV365hmZF.description: The nalfeshnee has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

jc3NboVcwuEiXOYn.name: Spider Climb
jc3NboVcwuEiXOYn.description: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

jgHhzAjFiPXlluVM.name: Magic Resistance
jgHhzAjFiPXlluVM.description: The satyr has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

jhhT9PsHy5A7EojO.name: Resurrection
jhhT9PsHy5A7EojO.description:
You touch a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, that didn't die of old age, and that isn't undead. If its soul is free and willing, the target returns to life with all its hit points.

This spell neutralizes any poisons and cures normal diseases afflicting the creature when it died. It doesn't, however, remove magical diseases, curses, and the like; if such effects aren't removed prior to casting the spell, they afflict the target on its return to life.

This spell closes all mortal wounds and restores any missing body parts.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Every time the target finishes a long rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it disappears.

Casting this spell to restore life to a creature that has been dead for one year or longer taxes you greatly. Until you finish a long rest, you can't cast spells again, and you have disadvantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
jhhT9PsHy5A7EojO.materials_component: A diamond worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

jlZrv208u9gYyh7I.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
jlZrv208u9gYyh7I.description: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.
jlZrv208u9gYyh7I.chat: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field.

jp6U9gVAnEqYxjal.name: Tail Attack
jp6U9gVAnEqYxjal.chat: The dragon slams its long tail against its foe!

jw9SyNUWRzgHe37B.name: Tail
jw9SyNUWRzgHe37B.chat: The Tyrannosaurus Rex attacks with its Tail.

k0g8uqoYdJ4LVxcn.name: Lightning Strike
k0g8uqoYdJ4LVxcn.description:
The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it.

Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
k0g8uqoYdJ4LVxcn.chat: The Storm Giant attacks with its Lightning Strike. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw.

k24xxFfPtUCahddE.name: False Appearance
k24xxFfPtUCahddE.description: While the darkmantle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a cave formation such as a stalactite or stalagmite.

k9uTT39kBp2sDDUE.name: Frightful Presence
k9uTT39kBp2sDDUE.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours .
k9uTT39kBp2sDDUE.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

kFPbmQZGCKfWRXpq.name: Wing Attack
kFPbmQZGCKfWRXpq.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

kKg1WU7qO2fLSB0e.name: Forceful Hand
kKg1WU7qO2fLSB0e.description: The hand attempts to push a creature within 5 feet of it in a direction you choose. Make a check with the hand's [[/check strength]] contested by the [[/skill strength athletics]] check of the target. If the target is Medium or smaller, you have advantage on the check. If you succeed, the hand pushes the target up to 5 feet plus a number of feet equal to five times your Spellcasting ability modifier. The hand moves with the target to remain within 5 feet of it.

kN6uf2h2Em4ol6Tz.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
kN6uf2h2Em4ol6Tz.description: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

kQMM3DSzE6UDZWZd.name: Swarm
kQMM3DSzE6UDZWZd.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

kRGZU8eMwOBt3kVd.name: Multiattack
kRGZU8eMwOBt3kVd.description: The xorn makes three [[/item .LRjB7lk0aa4TOd16]]{claw} attacks and one [[/item .ODAa1IROPs40MUI2]]{bite} attack.

kSPRpeIx3w3nihrF.name: Dream
kSPRpeIx3w3nihrF.description:
This spell shapes a creature's dreams. Choose a creature known to you as the target of this spell. The target must be on the same plane of existence as you. Creatures that don't sleep, such as elves, can't be contacted by this spell. You, or a willing creature you touch, enters a trance state, acting as a messenger. While in the trance, the messenger is aware of his or her surroundings, but can't take Actions or move.

If the target is asleep, the messenger appears in the target's dreams and can converse with the target as long as it remains asleep, through the Duration of the spell. The messenger can also shape The Environment of the dream, creating landscapes, Objects, and other images. The messenger can emerge from the trance at any time, ending the effect of the spell early. The target recalls the dream perfectly upon waking. If the target is awake when you cast the spell, the messenger knows it, and can either end the trance (and the spell) or wait for the target to fall asleep, at which point the messenger appears in the target's dreams.

You can make the messenger appear monstrous and terrifying to the target. If you do, the messenger can deliver a message of no more than ten words and then the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, echoes of the phantasmal monstrosity spawn a nightmare that lasts the Duration of the target's sleep and prevents the target from gaining any benefit from that rest. In addition, when the target wakes up, it takes 3d6 psychic damage.

If you have a body part, lock of hair, clipping from a nail, or similar portion of the target's body, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage.
kSPRpeIx3w3nihrF.materials_component: A handful of sand, a dab of ink, and a writing quill plucked from a sleeping bird

kT6wF3F49uuWgP3h.name: Swallow
kT6wF3F49uuWgP3h.description:
The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling.

If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

kWquVg3QhBwODyz3.name: Multiattack
kWquVg3QhBwODyz3.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .zMT1Uj814On8O1Hg]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .tz3vYeFf3GLouPGC]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .kYySllKlNPBsT7Ho]]{claws}.

kYySllKlNPBsT7Ho.name: Claw
kYySllKlNPBsT7Ho.chat: The Adult Blue Dragon attacks with its Claw.

kZAndihX3RcDqN5P.name: Frightful Presence
kZAndihX3RcDqN5P.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
kZAndihX3RcDqN5P.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

kZJqCMW6SxV5C0nu.name: Spiked Shield
kZJqCMW6SxV5C0nu.chat: The Lizardfolk attacks with its Spiked Shield.

kf6ELkKrSnpD2fwD.name: Magic Resistance
kf6ELkKrSnpD2fwD.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL.name: Mending
kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL.description:
This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as a broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.

This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

kk9fXkx19bCD5Qqv.name: Multiattack
kk9fXkx19bCD5Qqv.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .Km7rUn5tu44KuVbz]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .DlxAB4bcOmBIn0UG]]{claws}.

kqrWunjvDSHdnPmW.name: Sure-Footed
kqrWunjvDSHdnPmW.description: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

ksaaTxIbKx2sJfia.name: Inflict Wounds
ksaaTxIbKx2sJfia.description:
Make a melee spell Attack against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 1st.

kuTDtAq2QL2Tmr4h.name: Bite
kuTDtAq2QL2Tmr4h.chat: The Young Black Dragon attacks with its Bite.

kvyuqG5WztblcJXb.name: Spellcasting
kvyuqG5WztblcJXb.description:
The sphinx is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): [[/item .Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]]{mage hand}, [[/item .oIzA2MEHwxhtQneU]]{minor illusion}, [[/item .udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ]]{prestidigitation}

1st level (4 slots): [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .3OZnNhunvRtPOQmH]]{identify}, [[/item .z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]]{shield}

2nd level (3 slots): [[/item .S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq]]{darkness}, [[/item .SleYkHovQ8NagmeV]]{locate object}, [[/item .zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]]{suggestion}

3rd level (3 slots): [[/item .15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]]{dispel magic}, [[/item .XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]]{remove curse}, [[/item .gopnZvS0c2jD5FP8]]{tongues}

4th level (3 slots): [[/item .pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf]]{banishment}, [[/item .tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]]{greater invisibility}

5th level (1 slot): [[/item .W4Qx5z0id6da0vqg]]{legend lore}
kvyuqG5WztblcJXb.chat: The sphinx is a spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

kwsQiZZFKo5ZOGB9.name: Breath Weapons
kwsQiZZFKo5ZOGB9.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Lightning Breath. The dragon exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save activity=w2CftR6CLr5PZ7zY]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=w2CftR6CLr5PZ7zY]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Repulsion Breath. The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=YElWYv6C5UfhAu48]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from the dragon.

l9Ju5KE7bbn3WpTm.name: Hold Monster
l9Ju5KE7bbn3WpTm.description:
Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be Paralyzed for the Duration. This spell has no effect on Undead. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.
l9Ju5KE7bbn3WpTm.materials_component: A small, straight piece of iron

lAwQmCYEd9CtDdTb.name: Innate Spellcasting
lAwQmCYEd9CtDdTb.description: The mephit can innately cast [[/item .2yHXEcrRbadZDr5M]]{heat metal} (spell save DC 10), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

lH49mvA2g5C44yM4.name: Limited Amphibiousness
lH49mvA2g5C44yM4.description: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.
lH49mvA2g5C44yM4.chat: The sahuagin can breathe air and water.

lJ2gJxLDBbFtLwdk.name: Hide Armor
lJ2gJxLDBbFtLwdk.description: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.

lLAigtCvoIuj0TM9.name: Vampire Weaknesses
lLAigtCvoIuj0TM9.description:
The vampire has the following flaws:

Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

lOIA9YKQU8xSx7Lj.name: Slam
lOIA9YKQU8xSx7Lj.chat: The Shambling Mound attacks with its Slam.

lOzkFHeXCdO2FB9X.name: Horrifying Visage
lOzkFHeXCdO2FB9X.description:
Each non-undead creature within 60 ft. of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 x 10 years.

A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.
lOzkFHeXCdO2FB9X.chat: Each non-undead creature within 60 ft. of the ghost that can see it must succeed make a Wisdom saving throw. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.

lPywASGOeP26s2D9.name: Amphibious
lPywASGOeP26s2D9.description: The kraken can breathe air and water.

lQ57BVbUiVe2tJcL.name: Cold Breath
lQ57BVbUiVe2tJcL.description: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
lQ57BVbUiVe2tJcL.chat: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

lQLxY76Q2g6iB9UT.name: Multiattack
lQLxY76Q2g6iB9UT.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .kZAndihX3RcDqN5P]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .qq17e5u6Bey1aHqo]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .Ja5vvhGRJnCi9YGT]]{claws}.

lRFwKaRqhFY4xNhJ.name: Multiattack
lRFwKaRqhFY4xNhJ.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .qFfEF7lLt2kH3RbA]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .d9xXEIYNNQjIMGF8]]{claws}.

lS2o3QOZ2lxKyi0L.name: Parry
lS2o3QOZ2lxKyi0L.description: The marlith adds 5 to its AC against one melee Attack that would hit it. To do so, the marlith must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
lS2o3QOZ2lxKyi0L.chat: The marlith adds 5 to its AC against one melee Attack that would hit it.

lSteE7vBmM70Jy3Z.name: Dark Devotion
lSteE7vBmM70Jy3Z.description: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

lUgfHIerFG9DvYSB.name: Wing Attack
lUgfHIerFG9DvYSB.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

lUm5wbaBhfO54dlB.name: Invisibility
lUm5wbaBhfO54dlB.description: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell).
lUm5wbaBhfO54dlB.chat: The duergar magically turns invisible. Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

lYSWskOMRCVLyWLZ.name: Bite
lYSWskOMRCVLyWLZ.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained], and the toad can't bite another target.
lYSWskOMRCVLyWLZ.chat: The Giant Toad attacks with its Bite. The target is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

lazTMrXNUpGCrKdR.name: Claws
lazTMrXNUpGCrKdR.chat: The Dust Mephit attacks with its Claws.

ldz0yUpzhV9Xlhss.name: Bite (Rat or Hybrid Form Only)
ldz0yUpzhV9Xlhss.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be cursed with wererat lycanthropy.
ldz0yUpzhV9Xlhss.chat: The Wererat attacks with its Bite. If the target is a humanoid, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

lfUDtJ8hdeULQzqa.name: Bites
lfUDtJ8hdeULQzqa.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is Medium or smaller, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the mouther.
lfUDtJ8hdeULQzqa.chat: The Gibbering Mouther attacks with its Bites. If the target is Medium or smaller, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

lfg28JvVAru30yJ4.name: Tentacle
lfg28JvVAru30yJ4.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.
lfg28JvVAru30yJ4.chat: The Kraken attacks with its Tentacle. The target is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

lnaGnxMzpYnbw1uU.name: Creation
lnaGnxMzpYnbw1uU.description:
You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within 'range': soft goods, rope, wood, or something similar. You can also use this spell to create mineral objects such as stone, crystal, or metal. The object created must be no larger than a 5-foot cube, and the object must be of a form and material that you have seen before.

The duration depends on the object's material. If the object is composed of multiple materials, use the shortest duration.

  • Vegetable matter - 1 day
  • Stone or crystal - 12 hours
  • Precious metals - 1 hour
  • Gems - 10 minutes
  • Adamantine or mithral - 1 minute

Using any material created by this spell as another spell's material component causes that spell to fail.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the cube increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 5th.
lnaGnxMzpYnbw1uU.materials_component: A tiny piece of matter of the same type of the item you plan to create.

lpyNJHYnhFtpLgo9.name: Rock
lpyNJHYnhFtpLgo9.chat: The Hill Giant attacks with its Rock.

lsZzJMqxUIjbczLM.name: Spear
lsZzJMqxUIjbczLM.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

lsey8RJZiuByt97z.name: Claw
lsey8RJZiuByt97z.chat: The Ancient Copper Dragon attacks with its Claw.

lslg4XVihVKQhwte.name: Legendary Actions
lslg4XVihVKQhwte.description: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

ltue5DUb1SZfphHE.name: Sting
ltue5DUb1SZfphHE.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
ltue5DUb1SZfphHE.chat: The Scorpion attacks with its Sting. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

lxwKTlmSXPr3wkUF.name: Legendary Resistance
lxwKTlmSXPr3wkUF.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

m1b40a7qTZXNiBLw.name: Pack Tactics
m1b40a7qTZXNiBLw.description: The rat has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the rat's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

m4B7gGdnTcIHeRpH.name: Pack Tactics
m4B7gGdnTcIHeRpH.description: The vulture has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vulture's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

m65uENAa93Pz8lLl.name: Chain Mail
m65uENAa93Pz8lLl.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

m68xw5aGQ7awxfYf.name: Heavy Crossbow
m68xw5aGQ7awxfYf.chat: The Knight attacks with its Heavy Crossbow.

m7dF0hheApwoJLpp.name: Frightful Presence
m7dF0hheApwoJLpp.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
m7dF0hheApwoJLpp.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

m8prrQUwqGwX6Jyk.name: Ooze Cube
m8prrQUwqGwX6Jyk.description:
The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover.

A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful DC 12 Strength check, and the creature making the attempt takes 10 (3d6) acid damage. The cube can hold only one Large creature or up to four Medium or smaller creatures inside it at a time.
m8prrQUwqGwX6Jyk.chat: The cube takes up its entire space. Other creatures can enter the space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the cube's Engulf and has disadvantage on the saving throw. Creatures inside the cube can be seen but have total cover. A creature within 5 feet of the cube can take an action to pull a creature or object out of the cube. Doing so requires a successful Strength check.

mBUKIzY6aUW5Fnlm.name: Dagger
mBUKIzY6aUW5Fnlm.chat: The Bandit Captain attacks with their Dagger.

mGamlcdui038L6gU.name: Bite
mGamlcdui038L6gU.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the ankheg can bite only the grappled creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

mGcPB4SMyYkHFK9N.name: Parry
mGcPB4SMyYkHFK9N.description: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

mJoNsESU5X2lBKqn.name: Bound
mJoNsESU5X2lBKqn.description: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet. As long as the guardian and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the guardian to travel to it, and the guardian knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the guardian is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (rounded up) is transferred to the guardian.
mJoNsESU5X2lBKqn.chat: The shield guardian is magically bound to an amulet.

mMdtSlNy6FuPju7p.name: Invisibility
mMdtSlNy6FuPju7p.description: The imp magically turns invisible until it attacks, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the imp wears or carries is invisible with it.
mMdtSlNy6FuPju7p.chat: The imp magically turns invisible. Any equipment the imp wears or carries is invisible with it.

mSRxk4sD2tHfYAUo.name: Innate Spellcasting
mSRxk4sD2tHfYAUo.description:
The lamia's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: disguise self (any humanoid form), [[/item .nslx2nT3p4lNkmdp]]{major image}

3/day each: [[/item .eS7XnnApoxRxYXPs]]{charm person}, [[/item .X4c8xCkmF8U9HUMz]]{mirror image}, [[/item .fVbCxFRaORalHB20]]{scrying}, [[/item .zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]]{suggestion}

1/day: [[/item .JQyigMNPiDnGI18b]]{geas}

mViCCkDhb1mA9oO6.name: Magic Resistance
mViCCkDhb1mA9oO6.description: The vrock has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

mZf3scqsBLavvot1.name: Stone Camouflage
mZf3scqsBLavvot1.description: The grick has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

mgFqi0ev8f7Ut19y.name: Heroes' Feast
mgFqi0ev8f7Ut19y.description:
You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink. The feast takes 1 Hour to consume and disappears at the end of that time, and the beneficial Effects don't set in until this hour is over. Up to twelve creatures can partake of the feast.

A creature that partakes of the feast gains several benefits. The creature is cured of all Diseases and poison, becomes immune to poison and being Frightened, and makes all Wisdom Saving Throws with advantage. Its hit point maximum also increases by 2d10, and it gains the same number of Hit Points. These benefits last for 24 hours.
mgFqi0ev8f7Ut19y.materials_component: A gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1000gp, which the spell consumes

mgNFoCeNcwVLej7g.name: Breath Weapons
mgNFoCeNcwVLej7g.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Fire Breath. The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save activity=o8fOmWWIqCYwGu3C]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=o8fOmWWIqCYwGu3C]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Weakening Breath. The dragon exhales gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=J4QhEMZOdsyIy2D6]] saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mhIdpV6rtYYjOBN5.name: Chain Shirt
mhIdpV6rtYYjOBN5.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.

mjn0iMGrjGTOn42w.name: Slam
mjn0iMGrjGTOn42w.chat: The Flesh Golem attacks with its Slam.

mjuHphDtsXPuLymt.name: Wing Attack
mjuHphDtsXPuLymt.description: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average]] damage and be knocked &Reference[prone]. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

mlWql992zSZ6hvl6.name: Tail
mlWql992zSZ6hvl6.chat: The Barbed Devil attacks with its Tail.

mll5ghZVkPuiyBoa.name: Keen Smell
mll5ghZVkPuiyBoa.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

muKb2wMq6khBe1yH.name: Innate Spellcasting
muKb2wMq6khBe1yH.description: The mephit can innately cast [[/item .KhwiSi9fwVfUPtku]]{sleep}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

mw93amZDA4ctKqvQ.name: Teleport
mw93amZDA4ctKqvQ.description: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

n9pJzTDsAwQxJVRl.name: Sacred Flame
n9pJzTDsAwQxJVRl.description:
Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

nCTze3rZpWcTeuYQ.name: Wall of Ice
nCTze3rZpWcTeuYQ.description:
The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is incapacitated or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a [[/save activity=1sgpSnbxz7JYshd3]] saving throw, taking [[/damage activity=1sgpSnbxz7JYshd3 average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.
nCTze3rZpWcTeuYQ.chat:
The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is incapacitated. The creature then makes a Dexterity saving throw.

The wall can be damaged and breached. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the space the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw.

nDvgtu7NSNCrREAv.name: Mimicry
nDvgtu7NSNCrREAv.description: The raven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom (Insight) check.

nE7YNnVM7srBcdfl.name: Create Whirlwind
nE7YNnVM7srBcdfl.description:
A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. The whirlwind lasts as long as the djinni maintains concentration (as if concentrating on a spell).

Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be restrained by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures restrained by the whirlwind move with it. The whirlwind ends if the djinni loses sight of it.

A creature can use its action to free a creature restrained by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a [[/check]] check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer restrained and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.
nE7YNnVM7srBcdfl.chat: A 5-foot-radius, 30-foot-tall cylinder of swirling air magically forms on a point the djinni can see within 120 feet of it. Any creature but the djinni that enters the whirlwind must make a Strength saving throw or be restrained by it. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 60 feet as an action, and creatures restrained by the whirlwind move with it. A creature can use its action to free a creature restrained by the whirlwind, including itself, by succeeding on a Strength check. If the check succeeds, the creature is no longer restrained and moves to the nearest space outside the whirlwind.

nEKlIbUhhx9akBjK.name: Multiattack
nEKlIbUhhx9akBjK.description: The marilith can make seven attacks: six with its [[/item .VzPNwzlwJ7knJ9MC]]{longswords} and one with its [[/item .BoIambnHLbZXr85T]]{tail}.

nF4ZHYj37UstHCUT.name: Multiattack
nF4ZHYj37UstHCUT.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .ftqEpCKoioTST72K]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .060hAjIEDdMDfVoE]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .pzDFBmC7wfQsMJzw]]{claws}.

nIYcqw8lbaWP1sSJ.name: Beast of Burden
nIYcqw8lbaWP1sSJ.description: The mule is considered to be a Large animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

nKX7IFrwLJsAsWXU.name: Frightful Presence
nKX7IFrwLJsAsWXU.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 ft. of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
nKX7IFrwLJsAsWXU.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

nO1hKkZifzX3UJ2y.name: Claw
nO1hKkZifzX3UJ2y.chat: The Adult Silver Dragon attacks with its Claw.

nOBAY4ulYbWMc8Pz.name: Bite
nOBAY4ulYbWMc8Pz.chat: The Ancient Red Dragon attacks with its Bite.

nWjLJm6ErLvCUvun.name: Fire Breath
nWjLJm6ErLvCUvun.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
nWjLJm6ErLvCUvun.chat: The dragon exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

nb2rVHLawik6EjMJ.name: Tail Swipe
nb2rVHLawik6EjMJ.chat: The aboleth swipes its tail against its prey!

ncKFI8v5vPO7kOFi.name: Frightful Presence
ncKFI8v5vPO7kOFi.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
ncKFI8v5vPO7kOFi.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

ndwCjJFBLTujojCl.name: Beard
ndwCjJFBLTujojCl.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned] for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
ndwCjJFBLTujojCl.chat: The Bearded Devil attacks with its Beard. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

neAokA0n390MXPMQ.name: Swarm
neAokA0n390MXPMQ.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

neEOya9BCR7VSH09.name: Bites
neEOya9BCR7VSH09.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 2d4 piercing average]] damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
neEOya9BCR7VSH09.chat: The Swarm of Beetles attacks with a flurry of Bites.

nfPMecUVS2iOgAKJ.name: Leather Armor
nfPMecUVS2iOgAKJ.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

nkPIb1htkHIdbJ97.name: Studded Leather Armor
nkPIb1htkHIdbJ97.description: Made from tough but flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes.

nnMmiUPuJEyViPaq.name: Change Shape
nnMmiUPuJEyViPaq.description:
The dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the dragon's choice).

In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Its statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

nobk1ka9lHYyoww0.name: Blood Frenzy
nobk1ka9lHYyoww0.description: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

npiswgaiGzupcEmw.name: Bite
npiswgaiGzupcEmw.chat: The Saber-Toothed Tiger attacks with its Bite.

nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU.name: Faerie Fire
nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU.description:
Each object in a 20-foot cube within range is outlined in blue, green, or violet light (your choice). Any creature in the area when the spell is cast is also outlined in light if it fails a Dexterity saving throw. For the duration, objects and affected creatures shed dim light in a 10-foot radius.

Any attack roll against an affected creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature or object can't benefit from being invisible.

nslx2nT3p4lNkmdp.name: Major Image
nslx2nT3p4lNkmdp.description:
You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube. The image appears at a spot that you can see within range and lasts for the duration. It seems completely real, including sounds, smells, and temperature appropriate to the thing depicted. You can't create sufficient heat or cold to cause damage, a sound loud enough to deal thunder damage or deafen a creature, or a smell that might sicken a creature (like a troglodyte's stench).

As long as you are within range of the illusion, you can use your action to cause the image to move to any other spot within range. As the image changes location, you can alter its appearance so that its movements appear natural for the image. For example, if you create an image of a creature and move it, you can alter the image so that it appears to be walking. Similarly, you can cause the illusion to make different sounds at different times, even making it carry on a conversation, for example.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it. A creature that uses its action to examine the image can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and its other sensory qualities become faint to the creature.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the spell lasts until dispelled, without requiring your concentration.

nt4mvfC9IXqg5p7q.name: Inscrutable
nt4mvfC9IXqg5p7q.description: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

nzkZgDrDq0RwWUao.name: Death Throes
nzkZgDrDq0RwWUao.description:
When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.
nzkZgDrDq0RwWUao.chat: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

o4v4mHxP82HTbIOX.name: Move
o4v4mHxP82HTbIOX.description: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

o7UvUGPaF9cnGcQi.name: Whirlwind of Sand
o7UvUGPaF9cnGcQi.description: The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession.

o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb.name: Wall of Force
o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb.description:
An invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range. The wall appears in any orientation you choose, as a horizontal or vertical barrier or at an angle. It can be free floating or resting on a solid surface. You can form it into a hemispherical dome or a sphere with a radius of up to 10 feet, or you can shape a flat surface made up of ten 10-foot-by-10-foot panels. Each panel must be contiguous with another panel. In any form, the wall is 1/4 inch thick. It lasts for the Duration. If the wall cuts through a creature's space when it appears, the creature is pushed to one side of the wall (your choice which side).

Nothing can physically pass through the wall. It is immune to all damage and can't be dispelled by Dispel Magic. A Disintegrate spell destroys the wall instantly, however. The wall also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel through the wall.
o9ZCvuD2B1OTcubb.materials_component: A pinch of powder made by crushing clear gemstone

oFwDpNHu44o0BRx1.name: Keen Sight and Smell
oFwDpNHu44o0BRx1.description: The vulture has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

oIzA2MEHwxhtQneU.name: Minor Illusion
oIzA2MEHwxhtQneU.description:
You create a sound or an image of an object within range that lasts for the duration. The illusion also ends if you dismiss it as an action or cast this spell again.

If you create a sound, its volume can range from a whisper to a scream. It can be your voice, someone else's voice, a lion's roar, a beating of drums, or any other sound you choose. The sound continues unabated throughout the duration, or you can make discrete sounds at different times before the spell ends.

If you create an image of an object—such as a chair, muddy footprints, or a small chest—it must be no larger than a 5-foot cube. The image can't create sound, light, smell, or any other sensory effect. Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it.

If a creature uses its action to examine the sound or image, the creature can determine that it is an illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the illusion becomes faint to the creature.

oL7vyWwH6bvXyl95.name: Breath Weapons
oL7vyWwH6bvXyl95.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Cold Breath. The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save activity=U5F5qe2Hu0r0yHmk]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=U5F5qe2Hu0r0yHmk]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Paralyzing Breath. The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 90- foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=9gMvqjbgKK42uyzr]] saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

oPddwb4BScCEDanp.name: Illumination
oPddwb4BScCEDanp.description: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 ft.

oRhC5cUi8uHMapul.name: Web Walker
oRhC5cUi8uHMapul.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

oVxtfa5RF6ibpTIt.name: Breath Weapons
oVxtfa5RF6ibpTIt.description:
The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

Lightning Breath. The dragon exhales lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save activity=w2CftR6CLr5PZ7zY]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=w2CftR6CLr5PZ7zY]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Repulsion Breath. The dragon exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=YElWYv6C5UfhAu48]] saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from the dragon.

oWGcJqNGhbIOeRjU.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
oWGcJqNGhbIOeRjU.description: The worg has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

oWzM562ozNrlfOZe.name: Multiattack
oWzM562ozNrlfOZe.description: The vrock makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .JwAFMjU7vHDDL2Ib]]{beak} and one with its [[/item .H5JJE8uS39dTI3Vg]]{talons}.

obYv0JJqJiMTsoIF.name: Bite
obYv0JJqJiMTsoIF.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
obYv0JJqJiMTsoIF.chat: The Poisonous Snake attacks with its Bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

og0rfDmwPObM3ulb.name: Immutable Form
og0rfDmwPObM3ulb.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

ohWgcdw603aWWXum.name: Frightful Presence
ohWgcdw603aWWXum.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
ohWgcdw603aWWXum.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

ojB2xDcEAx6QHZAu.name: Keen Smell
ojB2xDcEAx6QHZAu.description: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

ojhTng7wa5ehcJz3.name: Legendary Actions
ojhTng7wa5ehcJz3.description: The kraken can take 3 legendary actions. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The kraken regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

oyE5nVppa5mde5gT.name: Animate Dead
oyE5nVppa5mde5gT.description:
This spell creates an undead servant. Choose a pile of bones or a corpse of a Medium or Small humanoid within range. Your spell imbues the target with a foul mimicry of life, raising it as an undead creature. The target becomes a skeleton if you chose bones or a zombie if you chose a corpse (the DM has the creature's game statistics).

On each of your turns, you can use a bonus action to mentally command any creature you made with this spell if the creature is within 60 feet of you (if you control multiple creatures, you can command any or all of them at the same time, issuing the same command to each one). You decide what action the creature will take and where it will move during its next turn, or you can issue a general command, such as to guard a particular chamber or corridor. If you issue no commands, the creature only defends itself against hostile creatures. Once given an order, the creature continues to follow it until its task is complete.

The creature is under your control for 24 hours, after which it stops obeying any command you've given it. To maintain control of the creature for another 24 hours, you must cast this spell on the creature again before the current 24-hour period ends. This use of the spell reasserts your control over up to four creatures you have animated with this spell, rather than animating a new one.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you animate or reassert control over two additional undead creatures for each slot level above 3rd. Each of the creatures must come from a different corpse or pile of bones.
oyE5nVppa5mde5gT.materials_component: A drop of blood, a piece of flesh, and a pinch of bone dust

oyNvUJRyGRVF22t8.name: Multiattack
oyNvUJRyGRVF22t8.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .dYJy66Ftt58qpTUi]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .YHom7FFObzrKEBLQ]]{claws}.

p7R5kkqAVQFKClRm.name: Charge
p7R5kkqAVQFKClRm.description:
If the skeleton moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.
p7R5kkqAVQFKClRm.chat: If the skeleton moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes extra piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked prone.

pByEnV0Y7QOI0ndA.name: Leather Armor
pByEnV0Y7QOI0ndA.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

pC1QJ005t6xVU8ZT.name: Chain Shirt
pC1QJ005t6xVU8ZT.description: Made of interlocking metal rings, a chain shirt is worn between layers of clothing or leather. This armor offers modest protection to the wearer's upper body and allows the sound of the rings rubbing against one another to be muffled by outer layers.

pEUD99mri5iDNGH7.name: Pincer
pEUD99mri5iDNGH7.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 15). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.
pEUD99mri5iDNGH7.chat: The Glabrezu attacks with its Pincer. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled.

pFFlq9KvfXzAxhU8.name: Poison Breath
pFFlq9KvfXzAxhU8.description: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
pFFlq9KvfXzAxhU8.chat: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

pHBLWUN5VKEjSBh6.name: Claw
pHBLWUN5VKEjSBh6.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], and the target is cursed if it is a creature.

The magical curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

pO4zGe5LmFIYqJiL.name: Bestow Curse
pO4zGe5LmFIYqJiL.description:
You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration of the spell. When you cast this spell, choose the nature of the curse from the following options:

  • Choose one ability score. While cursed, the target has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made with that ability score.
  • While cursed, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against you.
  • While cursed, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns. If it fails, it wastes its action that turn doing nothing.
  • While the target is cursed, your attacks and spells deal an extra 1d8 necrotic damage to the target.

A remove curse spell ends this effect. At the DM's option, you may choose an alternative curse effect, but it should be no more powerful than those described above. The DM has final say on such a curse's effect.

At Higher Levels. If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration is concentration, up to 10 minutes. If you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration is 8 hours. If you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration is 24 hours. If you use a 9th level spell slot, the spell lasts until it is dispelled. Using a spell slot of 5th level or higher grants a duration that doesn't require concentration.

pPThO0mEw9iMaJw7.name: Sword
pPThO0mEw9iMaJw7.chat: The Iron Golem attacks with its Sword.

pQdtHaxlArSTjbqb.name: Pounce
pQdtHaxlArSTjbqb.description:
If the lion moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].

If the target is prone, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
pQdtHaxlArSTjbqb.chat: If the lion moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must make a Strength saving throw.

pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj.name: Pass without Trace
pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj.description: A veil of shadows and Silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the Duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.
pRMvmknwLf2tdMTj.materials_component: Ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce

pVlKFunmE2qxO0pe.name: Misty Escape
pVlKFunmE2qxO0pe.description:
When it drops to 0 hit points outside its resting place, the vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that it isn't in sunlight or running water. If it can't transform, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 hit points in mist form, it can't revert to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it reverts to its vampire form. It is then paralyzed until it regains at least 1 hit point. After spending 1 hour in its resting place with 0 hit points, it regains 1 hit point.
pVlKFunmE2qxO0pe.chat: A slain vampire transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious.

pZLDhUyfsObRKMpP.name: Pack Tactics
pZLDhUyfsObRKMpP.description: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

pl7hO2z20EnTaPZt.name: Shortsword
pl7hO2z20EnTaPZt.chat: The Half-Red Dragon Veteran attacks with its Shortsword.

pnfC0DIa1eqXGjku.name: Innate Spellcasting
pnfC0DIa1eqXGjku.description:
The gnome's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .aU62xVUBYkAQWIHv]]{nondetection} (self only)

1/day each: [[/item .zwGsAv6kmwzYGhh3]]{blindness/deafness}, [[/item .UDUnlfPsOAbq2RSE]]{blur}, [[/item .A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv]]{disguise self}

ppWAAEul0QHtm4er.name: Detect Thoughts
ppWAAEul0QHtm4er.description:
For the duration, you can read the thoughts of certain creatures. When you cast the spell and as your action on each turn until the spell ends, you can focus your mind on any one creature that you can see within 30 feet of you. If the creature you choose has an Intelligence of 3 or lower or doesn't speak any language, the creature is unaffected.

You initially learn the surface thoughts of the creature—what is most on its mind in that moment. As an action, you can either shift your attention to another creature's thoughts or attempt to probe deeper into the same creature's mind. If you probe deeper, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. If it fails, you gain insight into its reasoning (if any), its emotional state, and something that looms large in its mind (such as something it worries over, loves, or hates). If it succeeds, the spell ends. Either way, the target knows that you are probing into its mind, and unless you shift your attention to another creature's thoughts, the creature can use its action on its turn to make an Intelligence check contested by your Intelligence check; if it succeeds, the spell ends.

Questions verbally directed at the target creature naturally shape the course of its thoughts, so this spell is particularly effective as part of an interrogation.

You can also use this spell to detect the presence of thinking creatures you can't see. When you cast the spell or as your action during the duration, you can search for thoughts within 30 feet of you. The spell can penetrate barriers, but 2 feet of rock, 2 inches of any metal other than lead, or a thin sheet of lead blocks you. You can't detect a creature with an Intelligence of 3 or lower or one that doesn't speak any language.

Once you detect the presence of a creature in this way, you can read its thoughts for the rest of the duration as described above, even if you can't see it, but it must still be within range.

pu8fxDuua6ObNqtg.name: Snow Camouflage
pu8fxDuua6ObNqtg.description: The wolf has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

pub0OWVEB71XQx1n.name: Feather Fall
pub0OWVEB71XQx1n.description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range. A falling creature's rate of descent slows to 60 feet per round until the spell ends. If the creature lands before the spell ends, it takes no falling damage and can land on its feet, and the spell ends for that creature.
pub0OWVEB71XQx1n.materials_component: A small feather or piece of down

pv497s1HuExllRI0.name: Legendary Resistance
pv497s1HuExllRI0.description: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

pwOLYvuj5c9fEQAH.name: Tail
pwOLYvuj5c9fEQAH.chat: The Adult White Dragon attacks with its Tail.

pxm7rAqI5ackW8Oy.name: Life Drain
pxm7rAqI5ackW8Oy.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
pxm7rAqI5ackW8Oy.chat: The Specter attacks with its Life Drain.The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf.name: Banishment
pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf.description:
You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence. The target must succeed on a Charisma saving throw or be banished.

If the target is native to the plane of existence you're on, you banish the target to a harmless demiplane. While there, the target is incapacitated. The target remains there until the spell ends, at which point the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.

If the target is native to a different plane of existence than the one you're on, the target is banished with a faint popping noise, returning to its home plane. If the spell ends before 1 minute has passed, the target reappears in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied. Otherwise, the target doesn't return.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 4th.
pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf.materials_component: An item distasteful to the target

pya9jchjLkwMedEr.name: Claw
pya9jchjLkwMedEr.chat: The Barbed Devil attacks with its Claw.

pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y.name: Blight
pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y.description:
Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes 8d8 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

If you target a plant creature or a magical plant, it makes the saving throw with disadvantage, and the spell deals maximum damage to it.

If you target a nonmagical plant that isn't a creature, such as a tree or shrub, it doesn't make a saving throw, it simply withers and dies.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 4th.

pzDFBmC7wfQsMJzw.name: Claw
pzDFBmC7wfQsMJzw.chat: The Adult Red Dragon attacks with its Claw.

Paralyzing Breath. The dragon exhales paralyzing gas in a 90- foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=9gMvqjbgKK42uyzr]] saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

q6pfCQyaPQSw2waZ.name: Hand Crossbow
q6pfCQyaPQSw2waZ.chat: The Spy attacks with their Hand Crossbow.

q6uVUHWyzht5OpwV.name: Sting
q6uVUHWyzht5OpwV.description:

The target must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
q6uVUHWyzht5OpwV.chat: The Giant Scorpion attacks with its Sting. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

qB9j7Epq7UVkGWzY.name: Bite
qB9j7Epq7UVkGWzY.chat: The Giant Constrictor Snake attacks with its Bite.

qFfEF7lLt2kH3RbA.name: Bite
qFfEF7lLt2kH3RbA.chat: The Young White Dragon attacks with its Bite.

qHJyEXRC7oExTjES.name: Pseudopod
qHJyEXRC7oExTjES.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

qJHrH8Q3q1JB5xe5.name: Heart Sight
qJHrH8Q3q1JB5xe5.description:
The sprite touches a creature and magically knows the creature's current emotional state.

If the target fails a [[/save]] saving throw, the sprite also knows the creature's alignment. Celestials, fiends, and undead automatically fail the saving throw.
qJHrH8Q3q1JB5xe5.chat: The sprite touches a creature. target must make a Charisma saving throw.

qLd01BTjVwH6NUfH.name: Invisibility
qLd01BTjVwH6NUfH.description: The sprite magically turns invisible until it attacks or casts a spell, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.
qLd01BTjVwH6NUfH.chat: The sprite magically turns invisible. Any equipment the sprite wears or carries is invisible with it.

qO61ofcSoMF4uxk8.name: Plate Armor
qO61ofcSoMF4uxk8.description: Plate consists of shaped, interlocking metal plates to cover the entire body. A suit of plate includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and thick layers of padding underneath the armor. Buckles and straps distribute the weight over the body.

qOh4l0rSZlQOEhyc.name: Keen Sight
qOh4l0rSZlQOEhyc.description: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

qRuJSlOzJITBzcjv.name: Claw
qRuJSlOzJITBzcjv.chat: The Young Gold Dragon attacks with its Claw.

qSKvifcPZvWEyQwS.name: Innate Spellcasting
qSKvifcPZvWEyQwS.description: The mephit can innately cast [[/item .IBJmWjzbQGu7M4UX]]{fog cloud}, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

qbSL2A0uKuh2iER5.name: Spell Storing
qbSL2A0uKuh2iER5.description: A spellcaster who wears the shield guardian's amulet can cause the guardian to store one spell of 4th level or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the guardian. The spell has no effect but is stored within the guardian. When commanded to do so by the wearer or when a situation arises that was predefined by the spellcaster, the guardian casts the stored spell with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no components. When the spell is cast or a new spell is stored, any previously stored spell is lost.

qd5qScYvDjNbDERs.name: Claw
qd5qScYvDjNbDERs.chat: The Ancient Bronze Dragon attacks with its Claw.

qfV8YlDhXHfI9Uin.name: Multiattack
qfV8YlDhXHfI9Uin.description: The dragon can use its [[/item .3ovBwWW2b9S8LYId]]{Frightful Presence}. It then makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .jLzmwSFLsR0jhWHF]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .rIzRUQvEexZL1wZx]]{claws}.

qlBBeTku9uoaEv8G.name: Multiattack
qlBBeTku9uoaEv8G.description: The gibbering mouther makes one [[/item .lfUDtJ8hdeULQzqa]]{bite} attack and, if it can, uses its [[/item .KQRvDGowc6ihejLu]]{Blinding Spittle}.

qlTIjSkjmEDQTj1x.name: Leather Armor (tiny)
qlTIjSkjmEDQTj1x.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

Sleep Breath. The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a [[/save activity=or1E73efg0UfoML2]] saving throw or fall &Reference[unconscious] for 10 minutes. qnFVVlRzucX7BNga.name: Leather Armor
qnFVVlRzucX7BNga.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

qoIR278ckqhlVaNr.name: Bites
qoIR278ckqhlVaNr.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or [[/damage 2d4 piercing average]] damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.
qoIR278ckqhlVaNr.chat: The Swarm of Spiders attacks with a flurry of Bites.

qodTzcDY37TCj4GN.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
qodTzcDY37TCj4GN.description: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

qpUx52QbFUCSPSln.name: Bite
qpUx52QbFUCSPSln.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
qpUx52QbFUCSPSln.chat: The Ettercap attacks with its Bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

qq17e5u6Bey1aHqo.name: Bite
qq17e5u6Bey1aHqo.chat: The Ancient Green Dragon attacks with its Bite.

qsfDO6B4wLP1UeKS.name: Bite
qsfDO6B4wLP1UeKS.chat: The Young Silver Dragon attacks with its Bite.

qzLZFBO75loU77TZ.name: Slam
qzLZFBO75loU77TZ.chat: The Air Elemental attacks with its Slam.

qzSE2ZiVMLKsWF4F.name: Darkness Aura
qzSE2ZiVMLKsWF4F.description:
A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as the darkmantle maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell).

Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the darkness overlaps with an area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.
qzSE2ZiVMLKsWF4F.chat: A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends out from the darkmantle, moves with it, and spreads around corners. Darkvision can't penetrate this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it.

qzphlErr2D2mRpxT.name: Multiattack
qzphlErr2D2mRpxT.description: The balor makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .6ZAh5TkiXwQMUfDB]]{longsword} and one with its [[/item .1oGgJQB1ItqyKoZ5]]{whip}.

r51OovswZTVF8Yna.name: Bite
r51OovswZTVF8Yna.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.
r51OovswZTVF8Yna.chat: The Kraken attacks with its Bite. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends.

r6GQ1TwNK7pinX0a.name: Fist
r6GQ1TwNK7pinX0a.chat: The Shield Guardian attacks with its Fist.

When you do so, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to 2d6 + your Spellcasting ability modifier.

sDvx0IybgYa8Q4WG.chat: The planetar's weapon attacks are magical. When the planetar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals extra radiant damage (included in the attack).

sIgV1p8nM1z4VZgY.name: Hooves

sSs3hSzkKBMNBgTs.name: Shield
sSs3hSzkKBMNBgTs.description: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

sYtyFXYWqxWT1uUI.name: Frightful Presence
