Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours .
sYtyFXYWqxWT1uUI.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

sZcc3bwnRjaDV9BZ.name: Freeze

sZcc3bwnRjaDV9BZ.chat: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes.

saU6KEYGTm2SZ3jv.name: Wing Attack

saU6KEYGTm2SZ3jv.chat: The dragon beats its wings! Each creature within 15 feet of the dragon must make a Dexterity saving throw.

sacY5ISgjFZCSNUi.name: Wing Attack

sgauK8Lyt8qxsxOH.name: Tentacle
sgauK8Lyt8qxsxOH.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by heal or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.
sgauK8Lyt8qxsxOH.chat: The Aboleth attacks with its Tentacle. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

sh91NilUd5bUZyiG.name: Talons

If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].
slVyUWagsSZ5CXSh.chat: If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

smHERNgdj5yGNQuD.name: Devil's Sight

stk9i3rPK7z99CDf.chat: A destroyed lich gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again.

tD8Vmsb4B5eqTOJA.chat: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

tE9TjxIMLnqDisjv.name: Reflective Carapace
tE9TjxIMLnqDisjv.description:
Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a d6. On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected.

On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.
tE9TjxIMLnqDisjv.chat: The tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

tEmV0HTreVHudOYa.name: Web Walker
tEmV0HTreVHudOYa.description: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ.name: Greater Invisibility
tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ.description: You or a creature you touch becomes Invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is Invisible as long as it is on the target's person.

tMH6Ivn4GmE1naMj.name: Harm
tMH6Ivn4GmE1naMj.description: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 14d6 necrotic damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. The damage can't reduce the target's Hit Points below 1. If the target fails the saving throw, its hit point maximum is reduced for 1 Hour by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it took. Any effect that removes a disease allows a creature's hit point maximum to return to normal before that time passes.

tOPVA2liaPY9pwgO.name: Bite

tRdXVBesxDaXdhqP.name: Echolocation

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

tXHiE3pxHbBF8bS6.name: Incorporeal Movement
tXHiE3pxHbBF8bS6.description:
The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.
tXHiE3pxHbBF8bS6.chat: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain.

tYZggJHgAbixP5rs.name: Nightmare Haunting
tYZggJHgAbixP5rs.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. A protection from evil and good spell cast on the target prevents this contact, as does a magic circle.

As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions. If these visions last for at least 1 hour, the target gains no benefit from its rest, and its hit point maximum is reduced by 5 (1d10). If this effect reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and if the target was evil, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag. The reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or similar magic.
tYZggJHgAbixP5rs.chat: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag magically touches a sleeping humanoid on the Material Plane. As long as the contact persists, the target has dreadful visions.

tbKbwgcprUBciliF.name: Spellcasting
tbKbwgcprUBciliF.description:
The mage is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The mage has the following wizard spells prepared:

Cantrip (at will): [[/item .EOmsUcFQJTfG2oio]]{fire bolt}, [[/item .Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]]{light}, [[/item .Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]]{mage hand}, [[/item .udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ]]{prestidigitation}

1st level (4 slots): [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}, [[/item .CKZTpZlxj7hjjo2H]]{mage armor}, [[/item .41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]]{magic missile}, [[/item .z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7]]{shield}

2nd level (3 slots): [[/item .wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]]{misty step}, [[/item .zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]]{suggestion}

3rd level (3 slots): [[/item .Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]]{counterspell}, [[/item .ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]]{fireball}, [[/item .yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]]{fly}

4th level (3 slots): [[/item .tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]]{greater invisibility}, [[/item .WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH]]{ice storm}

5th level (1 slots): [[/item .RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]]{cone of cold}
tbKbwgcprUBciliF.chat: The mage is a spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

uCaHWOOBeJEyR1ay.chat: The unicorn touches another creature with its horn. The target magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points. In addition, the touch removes all diseases and neutralizes all poisons afflicting the target.

uCud2s4TjMfjiXUb.name: Spirit Guardians
uCud2s4TjMfjiXUb.description:
You call forth spirits to protect you. They flit around you to a distance of 15 feet for the duration. If you are good or neutral, their spectral form appears angelic or fey (your choice). If you are evil, they appear fiendish.

When you cast this spell, you can designate any number of creatures you can see to be unaffected by it. An affected creature's speed is halved in the area, and when the creature enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 3d8 radiant damage (if you are good or neutral) or 3d8 necrotic damage (if you are evil). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 3rd.

uGJpXeUbei6zXTd1.name: Multiattack
uGJpXeUbei6zXTd1.description: The mummy can use its [[/item .8Jju4CVZaIDab6Ju]]{Dreadful Glare} and makes one attack with its [[/item .ik1IkSZi4fpiGbB3]]{rotting fist}.

uMZgFW5l9JQmFBp8.name: Amphibious
uMZgFW5l9JQmFBp8.description: The chuul can breathe air and water.

uQpDpdmzlAyQKbRu.name: Keen Smell
uQpDpdmzlAyQKbRu.description: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

uRaC62ut3Hk63e7m.name: Innate Spellcasting
uRaC62ut3Hk63e7m.description:
The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: [[/item .CAxSzHWizrafT033]]{dancing lights}

1/day each: [[/item .S7VbUetIfVT7B6Eq]]{darkness}, [[/item .nqBDWkVOfcGZt4YU]]{faerie fire}

uSay5J2sf9zXsabi.name: Corrode Metal
uSay5J2sf9zXsabi.description:
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits the ooze corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls.

If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits the ooze is destroyed after dealing damage. The ooze can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP.name: Cure Wounds
uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP.description:
A creature you touch regains a number of hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

uXxifk618IakGfYG.name: Claw
uXxifk618IakGfYG.chat: The Adult Black Dragon attacks with its Claw.

udSiVp4nSrGBSvG1.name: Shillelagh
udSiVp4nSrGBSvG1.description: The wood of a club or quarterstaff you are holding is imbued with nature's power. For the duration, you can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon, and the weapon's damage die becomes a d8. The weapon also becomes magical, if it isn't already. The spell ends if you cast it again or if you let go of the weapon.
udSiVp4nSrGBSvG1.materials_component: A shamrock leaf, and a club or quarterstaff

udfhkp3BOEpgThbR.name: Multiattack
udfhkp3BOEpgThbR.description: The medusa makes either three melee attacks - one with its [[/item .1N53jrQmsZuhiREF]]{snake hair} and two with its [[/item .ixrzcEmkn9jaDOZ0]]{shortsword} - or two ranged attacks with its [[/item .4U98oe3Qr28BGbzG]]{longbow}.

udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ.name: Prestidigitation
udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ.description:
This spell is a minor magical trick that novice spellcasters use for practice. You create one of the following magical effects within range:

  • You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.
  • You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.
  • You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
  • You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.
  • You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
  • You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

udtRN8dgOiBhUuZh.name: Teleport
udtRN8dgOiBhUuZh.description: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

und47mebgauAcPu4.name: Legendary Actions
und47mebgauAcPu4.description: The mummy lord can take 3 legendary actions. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The mummy lord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
und47mebgauAcPu4.chat: The mummy lord can take 3 legendary actions.

uqHuj7Pjf2sjny21.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
uqHuj7Pjf2sjny21.description:
Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. [[/damage extended]].

The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

usmJdksgWhPnjq94.name: Heated Body
usmJdksgWhPnjq94.description: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.
usmJdksgWhPnjq94.chat: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes fire damage.

ut9yaZWaSkU7bT1h.name: Tail Attack
ut9yaZWaSkU7bT1h.chat: The dragon slams its long tail against its foe!

uwDyoGhbCR8NoRmc.name: Multiattack
uwDyoGhbCR8NoRmc.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .KuuOPjJ1YeTtjGbN]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .3UHmbpT3v3FTlplI]]{claws}.

uxrpcslS4BkraMVB.name: Freedom of Movement
uxrpcslS4BkraMVB.description: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.
uxrpcslS4BkraMVB.chat: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained.

uyWDYVSAJuCfayLE.name: Blood Frenzy
uyWDYVSAJuCfayLE.description: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

v3i1DaUS4Bkc8Ser.name: Death Burst
v3i1DaUS4Bkc8Ser.description: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must then succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be &Reference[blinded] for 1 minute. A blinded creature can repeat the saving throw on each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
v3i1DaUS4Bkc8Ser.chat: When the mephit dies, it explodes in a burst of dust. Each creature within 5 ft. of it must make a Constitution saving throw.

v5TMyixZTtiw13d7.name: Tail
v5TMyixZTtiw13d7.chat: The Adult Silver Dragon attacks with its Tail.

v6ZspnPr8G5hApkL.name: Pseudopod
v6ZspnPr8G5hApkL.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.
v6ZspnPr8G5hApkL.chat: The Black Pudding attacks with its Pseudopod. In addition, nonmagical armor worn by the target is partly dissolved and takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers.

v92F1DGzRWSEMPxH.name: Frightful Presence
v92F1DGzRWSEMPxH.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
v92F1DGzRWSEMPxH.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

vEEJei0CNaNbfQ2w.name: Slam
vEEJei0CNaNbfQ2w.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.
vEEJei0CNaNbfQ2w.chat: The Clay Golem attacks with its Slam. If the target is a creature, it must make a Constitution saving throw.

vFBjTLrkdsB0llcn.name: Pack Tactics
vFBjTLrkdsB0llcn.description: The shark has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the shark's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

vJAkNKhTmRrz6Zoq.name: Greataxe
vJAkNKhTmRrz6Zoq.chat: The Minotaur Skeleton attacks with its Greataxe.

vJR81iEOZYNMuAdz.name: Invisibility
vJR81iEOZYNMuAdz.description: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).
vJR81iEOZYNMuAdz.chat: The will-o'-wisp and its light magically become invisible.

vLQAjoewGE5MAHn2.name: Multiattack
vLQAjoewGE5MAHn2.description: The devil makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .DV4KS0OE541vGOtI]]{bite}, one with its [[/item .E6iXljYXLdQyfk1l]]{claws}, and one with its [[/item .AQ551xglVn90BdwU]]{tail}.

vS7OqBXfpfbsx5Rh.name: Keen Smell
vS7OqBXfpfbsx5Rh.description: The panther has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

vTDqx7A0xzxkZCqc.name: Spider Climb
vTDqx7A0xzxkZCqc.description: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

vTb2KSllrajm88Ni.name: Leather Armor
vTb2KSllrajm88Ni.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

vUqKQJ1GGWbKg6cX.name: Slam
vUqKQJ1GGWbKg6cX.chat: The Animated Armor makes a slam attack!

vUyYxadU3cXz7Zqf.name: Magic Resistance
vUyYxadU3cXz7Zqf.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

vd2pvVVxaLhqrWqe.name: Leather Armor
vd2pvVVxaLhqrWqe.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

vdaEgOdpIO2o7GNX.name: Hide Armor
vdaEgOdpIO2o7GNX.description: This crude armor consists of thick furs and pelts. It is commonly worn by barbarian tribes, evil humanoids, and other folk who lack access to the tools and materials needed to create better armor.

vgK74YR1Lv2WrGCx.name: Interposing Hand
vgK74YR1Lv2WrGCx.description: The hand interposes itself between you and a creature you choose until you give the hand a different command. The hand moves to stay between you and the target, providing you with half cover against the target. The target can't move through the hand's space if its Strength score is less than or equal to the hand's Strength score. If its Strength score is higher than the hand's Strength score, the target can move toward you through the hand's space, but that space is difficult terrain for the target.

vk0gd3buCPWGpyYF.name: Regeneration
vk0gd3buCPWGpyYF.description: The shield guardian regains [[/heal]]{10} hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.
vk0gd3buCPWGpyYF.chat: The shield guardian regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn.

vlmHYqAZxNGh8xQ6.name: Magic Resistance
vlmHYqAZxNGh8xQ6.description: The quasit has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

vnAmgF7ZkpmDIJSc.name: Multiattack
vnAmgF7ZkpmDIJSc.description: The unicorn makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .f7m44y4TqYYcunMj]]{hooves} and one with its [[/item .ORrGdhTLKLTKK3BH]]{horn}.

vnO8N4pro9PVOOQn.name: Multiattack
vnO8N4pro9PVOOQn.description: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .j1LTHxGLXWdnEbwq]]{bite} and one with its [[/item .HzLuzqlmtBSeSS4Q]]{stinger}. While flying, it can use its [[/item .Wa8BU72wRqyBCqkI]]{claws} in place of one other attack.

vuDMChx74s6CMCab.name: Hold Breath
vuDMChx74s6CMCab.description: The crocodile can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

vyI1tbobhrYMxj76.name: Beak
vyI1tbobhrYMxj76.chat: The Giant Eagle attacks with its Beak.

w4oJusdFuSttyz8X.name: Spider Climb
w4oJusdFuSttyz8X.description: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

wF7eGWgo8AZNTcyg.name: Multiattack
wF7eGWgo8AZNTcyg.description: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .T2JS1VEL7U2s92Fj]]{beak} and one with its [[/item .ldVEDIAP2PHxLHsL]]{claws}.

wPHhtm2eyM9LKpT4.name: Devil's Sight
wPHhtm2eyM9LKpT4.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Darkvision.

wSqPYa5GWfBsLRbY.name: Siege Monster
wSqPYa5GWfBsLRbY.description: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

wUEVmK5TEnYsMuwJ.name: Fire Breath
wUEVmK5TEnYsMuwJ.description: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
wUEVmK5TEnYsMuwJ.chat: The dragon exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw.

wVCkpBj5omvdfaMm.name: Lightning Storm
wVCkpBj5omvdfaMm.description:
The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it.

A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
wVCkpBj5omvdfaMm.chat: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a Dexterity saving throw.

wYuyOwVFLle1u78H.name: Move
wYuyOwVFLle1u78H.description: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

wdOqdYfLb2Nu1Uud.name: Withering Touch
wdOqdYfLb2Nu1Uud.chat: The Ghost attacks with its Withering Touch.

weFcATmtqqUJ39Pw.name: Pack Tactics
weFcATmtqqUJ39Pw.description: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

wklAUVakX97y0z2S.name: Pounce
wklAUVakX97y0z2S.description:
If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked &Reference[prone].

If the target is prone, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.
wklAUVakX97y0z2S.chat: If the tiger moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must make a Strength saving throw.

wkqjn4bqhPIUUo7k.name: Fear Aura
wkqjn4bqhPIUUo7k.description: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a [[/save]] saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is &Reference[frightened] until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.
wkqjn4bqhPIUUo7k.chat: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a Wisdom saving throw.

wonRQjOkc9E7RYtd.name: Leather Armor
wonRQjOkc9E7RYtd.description: The breastplate and shoulder protectors of this armor are made of leather that has been stiffened by being boiled in oil. The rest of the armor is made of softer and more flexible materials.

wpqra38jsZPRAuov.name: Multiattack
wpqra38jsZPRAuov.description: The scorpion makes three attacks: two with its [[/item .OJ2b64O3e1nni21W]]{claws} and one with its [[/item .q6uVUHWyzht5OpwV]]{sting}.

wqfAVANuQonNBgnL.name: Misty Step
wqfAVANuQonNBgnL.description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

wqgAyjgICylYksGZ.name: Chomp
wqgAyjgICylYksGZ.description: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.

wtPKdh22QAc93kgt.name: Spellcasting
wtPKdh22QAc93kgt.description:
The naga is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks), and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): [[/item .kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL]]{mending}, [[/item .n9pJzTDsAwQxJVRl]]{sacred flame}, [[/item .MUO1uYN7JR1hm4dR]]{thaumaturgy}

1st level (4 slots): [[/item .arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]]{command}, [[/item .uUWb1wZgtMou0TVP]]{cure wounds}, [[/item .jZ6JNykRtdQ90MOo]]{shield of faith}

2nd level (3 slots): [[/item .3MYDjS6k9IYL0aTj]]{calm emotions}, [[/item .3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4]]{hold person}

3rd level (3 slots): [[/item .pO4zGe5LmFIYqJiL]]{bestow curse}, [[/item .cg50KpBkBdPK6vPL]]{clairvoyance}

4th level (3 slots): [[/item .pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf]]{banishment}, [[/item .da0a1t2FqaTjRZGT]]{freedom of movement}

5th level (2 slots): [[/item .5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]]{flame strike}, [[/item .JQyigMNPiDnGI18b]]{geas}

6th level (1 slot): [[/item .XzkJpE6XpZfKjODD]]{true seeing}
wtPKdh22QAc93kgt.chat: The naga is an spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

wvlDMuDDdk7peoPa.name: Corrosive Form
wvlDMuDDdk7peoPa.description:
A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 4 (1d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes.

After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal or wood that hits the pudding is destroyed after dealing damage. The pudding can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.
wvlDMuDDdk7peoPa.chat: A creature that touches the pudding or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of metal or wood that hits the pudding corrodes.

wwQTeXOmFLO2MW0Y.name: Tree Stride
wwQTeXOmFLO2MW0Y.description: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

wzRyhY2I1U0ytB7D.name: Regeneration
wzRyhY2I1U0ytB7D.description: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.
wzRyhY2I1U0ytB7D.chat: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn.

wziRdUn3HafZKJ8o.name: Multiattack
wziRdUn3HafZKJ8o.description: The veteran makes two [[/item .WaEunPCFG0EddNTt]]{longsword} attacks. If it has a [[/item .cXf5q5xw30ICGxZg]]{shortsword} drawn, it can also make a shortsword attack.

x44GisqrxHYC5fov.name: Poison Breath
x44GisqrxHYC5fov.description: The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
x44GisqrxHYC5fov.chat: The golem exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw.

x6Hd2pSXy7TDwgjR.name: Treasure Sense
x6Hd2pSXy7TDwgjR.description: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 ft. of it.

x7uPzThV97uQxTun.name: Bite
x7uPzThV97uQxTun.chat: The Silver Dragon Wyrmling attacks with its Bite.

xDjzXK9dbD2EV8hi.name: Multiattack
xDjzXK9dbD2EV8hi.description: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .22lf3TLPObmD4s6h]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .LGFPSpA0pvVpj3cF]]{claws}.

xL1zgEf89s0xSVlW.name: Echolocation
xL1zgEf89s0xSVlW.description: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

xQ1RYlOxb6lMRhdI.name: Multiattack
xQ1RYlOxb6lMRhdI.description: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its [[/item .UNNl5XqsXZuKOm69]]{bite} and two with its [[/item .HEQqPUsmmNs178Mj]]{claws}.

xSzDPptifNbKyf5N.name: Charge
xSzDPptifNbKyf5N.description:
If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra [[/damage average]] damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be knocked prone.
xSzDPptifNbKyf5N.chat: If the elk moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra damage. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

xZPFtf2vCYraWXVe.name: Wraith - Life Drain
xZPFtf2vCYraWXVe.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.
xZPFtf2vCYraWXVe.chat: The Wraith attacks with its Life Drain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

xZSeAPj02NKne0AK.name: Multiattack
xZSeAPj02NKne0AK.description: The mummy can use its [[/item .yHydHrxw4vlDlyjf]]{Dreadful Glare} and makes one attack with its [[/item .M6t9H8pMhzQxM9qv]]{rotting fist}.

xZeM7pLE9OPzdhBY.name: Standing Leap
xZeM7pLE9OPzdhBY.description: The bulette's long jump is up to 30 ft. and its high jump is up to 15 ft., with or without a running start.

xpakQFJhIVCQz3Si.name: Two-Headed
xpakQFJhIVCQz3Si.description: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

xqwxVn28J0zx8Y7H.name: Longsword
xqwxVn28J0zx8Y7H.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]], or [[/damage average attackMode=twoHanded]] damage if used with two hands.

xr59rWl3oCOLdQBQ.name: Hold Breath
xr59rWl3oCOLdQBQ.description: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

xt4Cm1tg8Xfodhdt.name: Devil's Sight
xt4Cm1tg8Xfodhdt.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's Darkvision.

xwZYlJUYOv2J044p.name: Javelin
xwZYlJUYOv2J044p.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]] in melee or [[/damage 1d6 + 2 piercing average]] at range.

y2j6GWf1Ur3GRtYI.name: Fire Absorption
y2j6GWf1Ur3GRtYI.description: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

y6iT81UwIkojo6c5.name: Lair Actions
y6iT81UwIkojo6c5.description: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair. On initiative count 20 (losing all initiative ties), it can use one of its lair action options. It can't do so while incapacitated or otherwise unable to take actions. If surprised, it can't use one until after its first turn in the combat.
y6iT81UwIkojo6c5.chat: If a legendary creature has lair actions, it can use them to harness the ambient magic in its lair.

yAVNzttgGO1cHIlQ.name: Legendary Actions
yAVNzttgGO1cHIlQ.description: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

yCZ6sgHxxIr0zIxO.name: Water Breathing
yCZ6sgHxxIr0zIxO.description: The sea horse can breathe only underwater.

yCp6Ire7GPbpAwpZ.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
yCp6Ire7GPbpAwpZ.description: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

yHydHrxw4vlDlyjf.name: Dreadful Glare
yHydHrxw4vlDlyjf.description:
The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy lord, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn.

If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies and mummy lords for the next 24 hours.
yHydHrxw4vlDlyjf.chat: The mummy lord targets one creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must make a Wisdom saving throw against this magic.

yJGmBczsD2hSQuzI.name: Frightful Presence
yJGmBczsD2hSQuzI.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
yJGmBczsD2hSQuzI.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

yOZK7sWcCRFmuAxz.name: Tentacles
yOZK7sWcCRFmuAxz.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it is &Reference[grappled] (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is &Reference[restrained], and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.
yOZK7sWcCRFmuAxz.chat: The Giant Octopus attacks with its Tentacles. If the target is a creature, it is grappled. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the octopus can't use its tentacles on another target.

yOjkK3f9jt2fYu3M.name: Tail Stinger
yOjkK3f9jt2fYu3M.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
yOjkK3f9jt2fYu3M.chat: The Purple Worm attacks with its Tail Stinger. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

yWYB2iyRA61AjcVJ.name: Regeneration
yWYB2iyRA61AjcVJ.description: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
yWYB2iyRA61AjcVJ.chat: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn.

yb6o6KfKlg9bGhqA.name: Pack Tactics
yb6o6KfKlg9bGhqA.description: The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

yczO5JpGxAk51Gp8.name: Multiattack
yczO5JpGxAk51Gp8.description: The gargoyle makes two attacks: one with its [[/item .A6GBvah75Y7fGjc5]]{bite} and one with its [[/item .ipJwA0j2zfzmq5GW]]{claws}.

yfN4gklLV7zqhzxo.name: Surprise Attack
yfN4gklLV7zqhzxo.description: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t.name: Fly
yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t.description:
You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the Duration. When the spell ends, the target falls if it is still aloft, unless it can stop the fall.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.
yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t.materials_component: A wing feather from any bird

ykZaywAeuqtWHAqQ.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
ykZaywAeuqtWHAqQ.description: The wererat makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

yo4YL40mReo1Gwx5.name: Magic Resistance
yo4YL40mReo1Gwx5.description: The deva has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

ysV0KgiPcJOYCdMh.name: Bite
ysV0KgiPcJOYCdMh.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

The target must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or take [[/damage average activity=dnd5eactivity100]] damage.
ysV0KgiPcJOYCdMh.chat: The Spider attacks with its Bite. The target must make a Constitution saving throw.

ytajTMHqbOxc0BvA.name: Bite
ytajTMHqbOxc0BvA.chat: The Giant Fire Beetle attacks with its Bite.

yud1cnEVQ9KxbmWc.name: Fire Form
yud1cnEVQ9KxbmWc.description:
The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes [[/damage average]] damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.
yud1cnEVQ9KxbmWc.chat: A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

yxlzyXTpsEf4QiI9.name: Aberrant Ground
yxlzyXTpsEf4QiI9.description: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.
yxlzyXTpsEf4QiI9.chat: The ground in a 10-foot radius around the mouther is doughlike difficult terrain. Make a Strength saving throw.

yxwZ9AtLMKZ61sTz.name: Antennae
yxwZ9AtLMKZ61sTz.description:
The rust monster corrodes a nonmagical ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it.

If the object is being worn or carried by a creature, the creature can make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw to avoid the rust monster's touch.If the object touched is either metal armor or a metal shield being worn or carried, its takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed. If the object touched is a held metal weapon, it rusts as described in the Rust Metal trait.
yxwZ9AtLMKZ61sTz.chat: The rust monster corrodes a ferrous metal object it can see within 5 feet of it. If the object isn't being worn or carried, the touch destroys a 1-foot cube of it.

z1WFJdHb8OXvW2yy.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
z1WFJdHb8OXvW2yy.description: The wolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7.name: Shield
z1mx84ONwkXKUZd7.description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

z8zfieQSSbMtBNQz.name: Limited Telepathy
z8zfieQSSbMtBNQz.description: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 ft. of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

z9JmFBY3z1pnVFX9.name: Keen Hearing
z9JmFBY3z1pnVFX9.description: The whale has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

zDlCrWQVJgZFMfxY.name: Acid Breath
zDlCrWQVJgZFMfxY.description: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a [[/save]] saving throw, taking [[/damage average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
zDlCrWQVJgZFMfxY.chat: The dragon exhales acid in a 90-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a Dexterity saving throw.

zEGUljO44aDmj8z5.name: Devil's Sight
zEGUljO44aDmj8z5.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the lemure's darkvision.

zEtaamYVRSqu81fy.name: Standing Leap
zEtaamYVRSqu81fy.description: The toad's long jump is up to 20 ft. and its high jump is up to 10 ft., with or without a running start.

zHwaxxXcDz8AE8Bj.name: Tusk
zHwaxxXcDz8AE8Bj.chat: The Giant Boar attacks with its Tusk.

zK5E9yD6BR0fZRBo.name: Teleport
zK5E9yD6BR0fZRBo.description: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
zK5E9yD6BR0fZRBo.chat: The nalfeshnee magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4.name: Suggestion
zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4.description:
You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this effect. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable. Asking the creature to stab itself, throw itself onto a spear, immolate itself, or do some other obviously harmful act ends the spell.

The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it pursues the course of action you described to the best of its ability. The suggested course of action can continue for the entire duration. If the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends when the subject finishes what it was asked to do.

You can also specify conditions that will trigger a special activity during the duration. For example, you might suggest that a knight give her warhorse to the first beggar she meets. If the condition isn't met before the spell expires, the activity isn't performed.

If you or any of your companions damage the target, the spell ends.
zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4.materials_component: A snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil

zMFGBLVpXSZC1Vjm.name: Bite
zMFGBLVpXSZC1Vjm.chat: The Adult Bronze Dragon attacks with its Bite.

zMT1Uj814On8O1Hg.name: Frightful Presence
zMT1Uj814On8O1Hg.description:
Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 ft. of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or become &Reference[frightened] for 1 minute.

A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
zMT1Uj814On8O1Hg.chat: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns.

zNDI1LvLKZ9Hi2Ew.name: Tail
zNDI1LvLKZ9Hi2Ew.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended]].

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save]] saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked &Reference[prone].
zNDI1LvLKZ9Hi2Ew.chat: The Dragon Turtle attacks with its Tail. If the target is a creature, it must make a Strength saving throw.

zTX7ZTUkqUMSbGII.name: Dagger
zTX7ZTUkqUMSbGII.chat: The Cult Fanatic attacks with their Dagger.

zV0DTNKndsVldLsV.name: Regional Effects
zV0DTNKndsVldLsV.description: The mere presence of a legendary creature can have strange and wondrous effects on its environment. Regional effects end abruptly or dissipate over time when the legendary creature dies.

zXzGfPnSFJbfZ7oW.name: Spellcasting
zXzGfPnSFJbfZ7oW.description:
The sphinx is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). It requires no material components to cast its spells. The sphinx has the following cleric spells prepared:

• Cantrips (at will): [[/item .n9pJzTDsAwQxJVRl]]{sacred flame}, [[/item .8zT7njvqbpXs4Cel]]{spare the dying}, [[/item .MUO1uYN7JR1hm4dR]]{thaumaturgy}• 1st level (4 slots): [[/item .arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]]{command}, [[/item .Mzh95utKDPIrjiH8]]{detect evil and good}, [[/item .ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]]{detect magic}• 2nd level (3 slots): [[/item .F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]]{lesser restoration}, [[/item .CylBa7jR8DSbo8Z3]]{zone of truth}• 3rd level (3 slots): [[/item .15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]]{dispel magic}, [[/item .gopnZvS0c2jD5FP8]]{tongues}• 4th level (3 slots): [[/item .pxpb2eOB6bv4phAf]]{banishment}, [[/item .da0a1t2FqaTjRZGT]]{freedom of movement}• 5th level (2 slots): [[/item .5e1xTohkzqFqbYH4]]{flame strike}, [[/item .WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]]{greater restoration}• 6th level (1 slot): [[/item .mgFqi0ev8f7Ut19y]]{heroes' feast}
zXzGfPnSFJbfZ7oW.chat: The sphinx is a spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom.

zii9P95YmeE6b4km.name: Bite
zii9P95YmeE6b4km.chat: The Green Dragon Wyrmling attacks with its Bite.

zkNT86Xasjyzk8Df.name: Angelic Weapons
zkNT86Xasjyzk8Df.description: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra 6d8 radiant damage (included in the attack).
zkNT86Xasjyzk8Df.chat: The solar's weapon attacks are magical. When the solar hits with any weapon, the weapon deals extra radiant damage (included in the attack).

zpzof99ziVJCU4hI.name: Trampling Charge
zpzof99ziVJCU4hI.description: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.
zpzof99ziVJCU4hI.chat: If the gorgon moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on Strength saving throw.

zqsYu35qYHNNeTWE.name: Stone Camouflage
zqsYu35qYHNNeTWE.description: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0.name: Fireball
ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0.description:
A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The fire spreads around corners. It ignites flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 3rd.
ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0.materials_component: A tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur

zwGsAv6kmwzYGhh3.name: Blindness/Deafness
zwGsAv6kmwzYGhh3.description:
You can blind or deafen a foe. Choose one creature that you can see within range to make a Constitution saving throw. If it fails, the target is either blinded or deafened (your choice) for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

zzskoOXzAiMDZfbc.name: Shapechanger
zzskoOXzAiMDZfbc.description:
The wereboar can use its action to polymorph into a boar-humanoid hybrid or into a boar, or back into its true form, which is humanoid.

Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.
zzskoOXzAiMDZfbc.chat: The wereboar can use its action to polymorph, or return to its true form.
